text: So happy. Bisa menginap di artemis villa and hotel. Karena pelayanan yang sangat baik yg mereka berikan kepada tamu. Tempatnya juga nyaman , yang pasti recomended bgt buat menginap dan istirahat di sini.
title: Holiday

text:
Berada di seminyak dan dekat sekali dari pantai membuat lokasinya sangat tepat bagi saya dan anak anak

Swimming pool pribadi di sebagian villa dan jacuzinya selalu membantu kami betah bermalas2an sepulang dari pantai

Ownernya baik sekali bahkan meminjamkan kami sepeda motor sesekali

Kami stay disini sudah ketiga kalinya dan selalu ingin kembali

Bravo Artemis!!
title: Selalu cinta tempat ini

text:
Tempat ini sungguh mempesona! Kami mendapatkan gratis penambahan 1 tempat tidur vila dan merasa bahwa kami seperti berada di surga. Tempat ini benar-benar berusaha menciptakan ketenangan yang tidak jauh dari jalan raya dan pantai. Kolam dan restorannya sangat bagus dan semuanya dijaga gar tanpa noda. Sarapan gratisnya sangatlah enak, kami tidak mencoba makanan yang lain. Orang lain mengatakan mereka kepanasan di kamar mandi dan kami setuju namun itu bukanlah masalah besar karena anda bisa segera menikmati ac kamar tidur anda atau ruang bersantai dan bagi saya bak mandi dapat membalikkan keadaan. Saya berharap saya mebawa beberapa garam mandi radox. Setiap harinya kamar kami selalu dibersihkan dan tempat tidurnya juga, handuk segar dua kali sehari dengan staf yang menyalakan mozie di kamar mandi untuk anda.

Tidak ada msalah dengan staf yang dengan ramah menyambut kami dan antar jemput gratis bandara sangatlah ramah. kami tidak ingin meninggalkan tempat ini. Menikmatinya!
title: Menakjubkan

text:
Kami merasakan pengalaman menginap selama 6 malam yang fantastis di Artemis. Meskipun di jantung Seminyak menyusuri gang begitu pribadi dan tenang, jauh dari keramaian. Pada hari pertama kami, kami tidak begitu banyak meninggalkannya. Sangat dekat dengan toko dan restoran. Dan dekat dengan pantai, cukup berjalan kaki sebentar. Kami menginap di villa dengan 2 kamar tidur dengan kolam renang sendiri yang sempurna. Megah dan menyenangkan dapat berenang setiap pagi, siang, dan malam hari. Di restoran/bar, kami juga menikmati malam yang menyenangkan. Sangat sepi tetapi stafnya sangat ramah. Pilihan makanan yang relatif bagus di restoran dan perbaduan masakan yang bagus jika Anda hanya ingin bersantai di sana. Sungguh menikmati sarapan Indonesia setiap hari, nasi atau bakmi goreng dengan buah segar dan jus.

Tapi juga dengan pilihan sarapan lainnya. Kami memperoleh pelayanan yang menyenangkan pada hari pertama kami, sangat santai. Vila yang sangat bersih dan rapi, tamannya indah dan kolam umum ukurannya cukup besar, dan tidak penuh sama sekali. Air con di kamar yang sangat dibutuhkan di Bali...., dan setelah membaca kajian ulang lainnya tidak ada aircon di kamar mandi atau area tinggal utama jadi tempat itu hangat tapi pastinya bukan masalah besar. Ukuran kamar mandi sangat besar di vila kami, pancuran yang kuat dan sempurna. Sudah pasti akan merekomendasikan untuk menginap disini, senang kami menemukannya dan dalam waktu singkat. Stafnya baik dan sangat mengakomodasi. Mereka membantu kami memesan kelas memasak dan mengatur sopir. Dan juga merekomendasikan restoran. Sangat sulit bagi kami untuk pergi....
title: Pengalaman Tinggal yang luar biasa

text: Very clean, friendly and helpful staff. A bit “rustic chic” as it isn’t a new place, but carefully maintained and VERY comfortable and convenient to all of Seminyak. As the Artemis is set back about 100m from the main road, it is wonderfully quiet and tranquil compared to the hustle & bustle outside. Our room was nicely appointed, we especially appreciated the medium-firm king sized bed which meant we slept really well. Didn’t see a single mosquito (could have been the time of year but housekeeping also lit the occasional mosquito repellant incense which also smelled quite nice). Extra plug adapters provided. Restaurant was well priced, food served quickly & was very tasty. Didn’t want to leave! Highly recommended for couples, groups, and families.
title: Highly recommended - quiet & comfy

text: Pictures do this place justice for sure. Really nice one bedroom villa, clean and spacious. Super friendly staff, helpful when needed, nice quiet location and still close enough to all the action. Pool is well maintained and very picturesque, sad to leave but happy to know we’ll be back soon.
title: Awesome first stop in Bali

owner_response.connection: 広報担当マネージャー
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I was upgraded to a villa outside the main hotel - a house with front garden, big space, two beds, super comfortable to sit on the front porch in my little yard. But there was a festival the next night (the villa is beside a yoga/food prep area) so they moved me to a different vila room with kitchen etc behind the pool. More modern and comfortable, but no outdoor area. I liked the quirky charm of the villa more. 

The pool is small but clean and relaxing. There was a big group that kind of took over and only three pairs of sun chairs. Breakfast has three choices and the Mexican was delicious. 

Staff was super friendly and helpful, showing me different options when they advised me to move. 

Location is about 3 mins from main road where you can find tons of food and stores, bars etc.
title: Great staff, quaint, wide variety of rooms

text:
We stayed here for 4 nights as part of our trio to Bali to celebrate my husband's 60th. Of the 5 places we stayed in (I alerted them all beforehand) this is the only one that made no effort to acknowledge it. We booked the studio apartment which looks NOTHING like the pictures. It is dark, musty and pretty grimy looking. We complained and were given an upgrade which was much better but told that we could only have it for 2 nights as they were full. 
On our return to our depressing room, we found it was even worse than we originally thought. There was no plug for the bath and the water coming out of the tap was a mere drip, so showering was impossible. The electric socket at the side of the bed was hanging out, blinds were filthy etc etc.
Location was great but unless you're staying in one of the villas, I would give it a miss
title: Disappointing

owner_response.text:
せっかくの記念日でしたのにお部屋の事でお客様には不快な思いをおかけして申し訳ありませんでした。
2019年10月にスタジオアパートメントは改装をいたしました。
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed 2 nites and is our best experience in Bali, having been to Ubud and Jimbaran. The villa is huge, bathroom huge and a nice living room with full equip kitchenette though we didnt use it. They clean the whole place and maintain neatness and tidy all the time. Staff were very warm and friendly. Breakfast was great as you get to choose from menu and is made fresh, very enjoyable. Lovely pool and well manicured gardens. Comfortable Super king size bed ! One of the best bathroom I have experience in my travels, consciously designed to serve its.purpose, functional yet beautiful with so much wardrobe space, allow you to pack yr things neatly within easy reach. water runs powerfully in the shower head, is rare to have in Bali. Clean & fresh smelling towels, all amenities included, make the whole stay so complete and comfortable. Will return for sure !
title: Lovely !

text: We stayed here for a week and loved it.  The location was good and close to some lovely restaurants ,bars and also the Beach .  There are also money changers and a Star mart ( small supermarket ) that are very close to the Villas on the main road.  It’s also close to a range of Spas if you want a massage. Pool was great and very relaxing too
title: Nice and Quiet

text: Artemis is located within walking distance to the beach and all the entertainment in the seminyak area. The staff were all very professional and delivered excellent, genuine service. The villa offers a variety of accommodation, from hotel suite room type, to all size of villas. I stayed at G3, 1 bedroom villa with plunge pool. The room was big, the bathroom big, the living room and kitchen was also big. The villa was very private. The breakfast selections were plentiful and good. When I return to Bali, I would definately return to Artemis.
title: Excellent accommodation

text: Stayed here 1 night whilst visiting friends in the area! Friendly staff and a peaceful relaxing atmosphere! Room decor was fantastic, all amenities provided including mosquito coils (which are needed) . I’m not saying they were bad, I just hate the little buggers! Breakfast was cooked fresh along with freshly squeezed juices! The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars, is I found the bed a bit hard! It needed a topper. Other than that, I have no problems staying here again!
title: Hidden Gem

text:
The location of this property is great. Only a few minutes’ walk to the beach and just off Camplung Tanduk which is a road with a few good bars on it but not as crazy and Kuta town. 

We booked one bed villa with whirl pool but our aircon broke so they moved  us to a two bed villa with private poll hurrah!

The staff were all very friendly and helpful, the place was clean by Bali standards but not by western standards. I was fine with this, some people might not be.  It was not unusual to find lizards in the bathroom and dragon flies in the living room. 
Mozzie nets were provided and each night they lit coils in our rooms. 

Both villas were huge and well equipped with full kitchens and massive bathrooms. The whirl pool in our first villa was not heated which was shame as it was nice to dip into on an evening.  The pool in our other villa had two sun loungers by it and a pool guy came by every day to take the leaves out etc.

The main pool of the complex is lovely but pretty small and there are nowhere near enough sun beds, of those available most of them are in the shade for the majority of the day. 

Breakfast was FANTASTIC. We ate in the restaurant once but then just got room service (to make the most of our amazing villa) on the other days. It was always delivered hot and promptly. 

The only grumble I have about the place is the bar prices. They were extortionate. 

The complex is a little more knocked about that the photos show but it was lovely all the same.
title: Amazing Villa's

text:
We are a family with 3 adolescent kids . We stayed  14 nights in the 3 br villa (2nd half of August 2018), direct next to the restaurant. It is very spacious and has a perfect pool.  About the villa, you can see it needs renovation. Taps are corroded, plaster is broken , glas walls have cracks , and everything is worn, but mostly clean.  So if you want a perfect, brand new and spotless location, go somewhere else.  However, after our first disappointment   we started to like the place very much. 
All the rooms are spacious and have airco. You can jump direct from the master BR in the pool. In the villa you have the most privacy you can imagine, without being secluded. Which is great for your kids and there is plenty of choice for spa’s, restaurants and shops. 
The location is really quiet, and just around the corner you are in the lively part of Seminyak. The staff is very helpful and will do all to make you happy, with a smile.  Taxi’s are cheap and bring you everywhere ( but be aware they over ask 3x if they do not have a meter, just walk away and they will accept your price. We payed for the trip to Seminyak square between 20k and max 50k IDR, which is only EUR 3)
The breakfast is good and there is a choice of 6 standard breakfasts, next you can choose a la carte ( ask for the menu). Coffee is not too good, so stay with the tea. 
Cleaning is daily , and you receive daily a set of fresh towels/linen.
I Read some comments about rats being there. Yes we have seen them as well, but staff is hunting them, they stay far awayfrom humans and our food so no need to worry . You are in a tropical country so there are more animals. We also saw squirrels, geckoos  and a Musang around our house. We thought that was part of the charm.
So all in all this place offers good value for money. If they do the renovations soon it is a perfect place. 

Ps , we asked for an upgrade to the  4 BR villa. Price was not too bad, but when we looked at it , we realized the 3BR is much nicer. The location is better, and the 4BR has no living room or kitchen at all. I would asvise to cheese the 3BR and ask for the one situated next to the restaurant.
title: Nice and Quiet, but needs renovation. Good value for money

text:
We were looking for a fast place to stay after teh quake in Lombok changes all our programs.
Artemis is near everything,Kuta, Seminyak, clubs, restaurant,pubs, but not inthe messy area.(10 mins by cab)
rooms are faboulus, clean,big,comfortable, pool is small but super pretty snd the staff helps u in a easy way!
perfect for who wants to stay in the centre of life in Bali but not in the mess!
title: PERFECT

text: We had 3 nights in a pool villa, had a very enjoyable stay and the staff were great...particularly the manager. Location is very handy with the beach a comfortable walk but also handy to shopping, restaurants and Bintang supermarket.
title: Great location, manager is a legend !

text: Enjoyed my three day stay. The staff was very friendly and the hotel manager was knowledgeable and spoke very good English. I really enjoyed their drivers, especially Ketut. The bed was comfortable and gigantic in size. The room was clean and well stoked with amenities.
title: Charming staff, clean room with a giant, comfortable bed and a nice pool.

text:
The room was small, bed was a little hard and pillows too thin. We were bitten by mosquitoes a few times. 

Hotel staff were nice and helpful though. They were quick to offer extra pillows when I asked and helped to book a taxi for our ride back to airport. Breakfast was really good, with a variety to choose from. Took the Mexican breakfast and American breakfast for the two nights we stayed.

Location is another plus factor. Just 5 min walking distance to the street shops, restaurants and spa houses. Seminyak beach is slightly further, about 15-20 min walk away.
title: Nice breakfast, near to beach

text: The staffs are always very friendly . The room i had was spacious. There was an essential oil burner complete with a bottle of oil. A really nice touch . The design of the room isn't very new or modern but to me , for the price i paid , it is reasonable. The bed was super huge ! The pool is also nice . This whole place gives me positive and feel good vibes. Location wise... near the clubs but not noisy. The entrance from the main road is right opp a cafe/restaurant .You may need ur car driver to go slow.. when u get in the small lane.. be prepared to turn right n follow the small road.
title: Nice escape

text:
First time staying here and loved it! Been traveling to Bali for 10 years now and stay at many different places. Hotel Artemis is great value for money in a great location. Still has Bali charm but everything you need. I stayed in a hotel room and was perfect for just me. Would also suit a couple or friends traveling together.

Breakfast was simple but enough, pool was delightful. 

I would definitely stay there again but maybe in one of the private villas next time.
title: Great hotel in a great location

text: Very clean (they clean twice per day) and nicely decorated rooms! Lots of breakfast choices and the wifi is fast and reliable. Personnel is super friendly! Located in a busy street, but you do not notice that at all inside the complex. Shops and beach are short walks away. Would definitely recommend this place!
title: Great value

text: This is our 2nd visit to Artemis. It is still a lovely quiet and peaceful place to stay. We stayed in an apartment which is very spacious. The staff working here are delightful, friendly and helpful. There is a but though. There needs to be some maintenance done on the rooms as they are beginning to look shabby. Also when we arrived there were only 4 pool loungers for the whole complex. A few days latter they did add another one. I consider this to be of poor service for their clients as most people on a holiday like to lounge around the pool. On the whole its still a lovely place in a great location but I would consider seriously whether to stay again at Artemis if some maintenance is not done.
title: Peaceful surrounds

text:
Great stay with great facilities 
Thank you to all the helpful staff and Mieko for making our stay a pleasant one.

Mante (housekeeper) was absolutely exceptional in her duties.

I will recommend to family and friends
title: Lovely

text: We spend 6 nights in the one bedroom villa with jacuzzi and had a lovely time. Staff very friendly. Artemis villa is very centrally located, but unfortunately not value for money. Villa needs some maintenance, esp in the bathroom. Bed very hard. Bathroom amenities only given on arrival and never refilled, despite us requesting some. Villa has a kitchen, but no kettle and no coffee setup. A coffee setup with daily replenishment is a need. Seminyak is a lovely, vibrant area to visit. We'll visit Seminyak again
title: Great location

text: Stayed 4 nights and everyone we met at the villa was really friendly and helpful. Massive beds and spacious, well equipped rooms. Tasty breakfasts served each morning by the pool and only a 10 min walk to the beach. Would recommend!
title: Quiet, secure and close to the beach

text: The Artemis was a little piece of heaven in the hustle and bustle of Seminyak, where you could walk off the main street into silence of the silence of the Villa.  So peaceful and quiet, the gardens are beautiful and well looked after, this is one of the outstanding features. We were staying for a week, so when we first arrived there was a miss communication on the booking and location of the room.  We were placed into a hotel room Area H, which I did not like, and asked for the pool area, which was accommodated.  When we moved into the A3 Pool Apartment which was lovely but had a dead rodent smell through it, there were oils burning in the main area, but this was not working .  I wanted to leave and go somewhere else in Seminyak.  When we spoke to Management we were moved next door to A2 which was the same layout etc but was very good.  In seeing three of the accommodation areas one thing stood out, that the bathrooms, desperately need updating or cleaning.  The mould was a real put off and housekeeping should be cleaning the walls and tiles properly. The actual apartment was brilliant and very spacious. There is a kitchen area, but no kettle to make yourself a drink, had to boil water in a saucepan. The staff at the Artemis are predominantly male with two females working in the front of the café. There is very limited interaction with any of the staff and no service whilst sitting around the pool, even though 4 staff were sitting behind the bar area watching TV all day. Every morning I had to set up our day beds which were packed away off to the side, then wait until a staff member turned up to get a towel later on.  There is limited day beds so we helped other patrons carry them around the pool so that couples could actually sit with one another and find shade, the staff were watching TV.  Many restaurants out on the main street worth trying, if you don’t want to walk too far and at the end of the street is the beach, which has numerous bars and restaurants, great way to finish off the day watching the sun set.  Has potential.
title: Peaceful Stay

text: The type o villa is huge with 3 rooms, private pool and Jacuzzi. Kitchen is equipped with stove and pans and kitchen ware. All rooms have aircon, except for the living area. Staffs are incredibly friendly, service is very good.
title: Wonderful Villa with private pool and Jacuzzi

text:
I recommend this hotel if you are after a no frills stay in Seminyak priced extremely well for a 3 Star resort.

We actually leave today & have been here for a week. 

We had a 2 bedroom pool villa (Villa 1). It's proportioned perfectly. The bedrooms are a great distance apart both with own bathrooms. My room kept having little issues but the staff were extremely accommodating with fixing things instantly. 

We are here in April so the pool only gets full sun for a few hours which makes swimming in the afternoon a bit chilly. In saying that the small resort pool gets sun all day so you can easily move there to continue baking! 😀 🌴 

The morning breakfast is reasonable as it was included in our room rate & they have massage staff who they will call in whenever you want a massage. 

I would recommend the Artemis but please be aware that this is a 3 star resort so things are a bit dated & the bathrooms could use a little bit of work including the amenities & towels etc. 

We love it here as it's so quiet but within walking distance to most things including the beach. The gay clubs are just around the corner so would be ideal if this was your scene.

Happy holidays.

Anita
title: Great Location & Friendly Staff

text: I visit Artemis the night before and day of Nyepi a silent day in Bali. We enjoyed a parade the eve before, then the entire island shuts down for 1 day of the year. No one on the streets, just a day of meditation and reflection amongst other beliefs for the locals. I enjoyed the entire experience. The poor staff were amazing given the very long shift and sacrifice they made, giving up their religious day and family time. We stayed in the private pool villa and found it very spacious and well set up. The garden was well kept and everything was clean and in order. Fragrant oil and mosquito repellant coil burning when we got there was a nice touch. The beds were comfortable and we enjoyed a night of DVDs and star gazing with the compulsory lights out nyepi night. Breakfast was good, coffee also. It's not quite as glamourous as the photos on the web but I enjoyed it all the same.
title: Nyepi day perfection.

text:
We always stay at Artemis when in Seminyak.
Service is superb & staff have been trained to very high standards.
Nothing is too much trouble.
Apartments & cool, clean & quiet & pool is amazing.
Highly recommend.
title: Brilliant ....

text:
we stayed in this complex for 2 nights the staff were friendly and the complex is very central for everything  
breakfast was delivered to villa which was nice ,everything was clean and it had a relaxing vibe although it was so central
title: lovely stay

text:
We ve spent 3 days there relaxing at the end of our Bali's trip.
The resort has a great localization in the city, the pool is awesome and also the room is huge!!
The receptionists are helpul and give you recommendations about what you have to do downtown and around.
You can rent a motorbike at the beginning of the quiet street of the hotel and the price isn't expensive ( 30 000 IDR per day ).
title: Nice stay in a quiet place

text:
I have been in Artemis in the month of Oct'16, this place is off the road. But once you enter the Villa it is amazing. It gives a feeling of a palace. We booked a 4 Bedroom villa with private pool. Amazing experience and a great feeling. 

Only issue was with the AC, it was not that powerful. As it was too hot and humid in October, this AC was of no use.

About the service, no complains. you call for it, you will get it. All eateries were near by so did not find any difficult to any food or money transfer.

Overall it is an amazing Villa and Amazing location.

Thanks to the entire team  of Artemis.
title: Amazing Villa... feels like Heaven

text: Down a little  side road just off a busy bustling road. Quiet oasis of calm. Pool area was beautiful, needed a few more sun loungers. Food was OK. Staff could have been a little more interactive but were attentive. Definitely would stay again if in Bali. Would recommend for quiet in the busy seminyak.
title: Very lovely very quiet

text: I read previous reviews and have found most were more than generous in their reviews. I wanted so much for this place to be my next great find to bring my children and grandchildren but as it is it won't be.  Mould in the bathroom is NOT acceptable. Thin lumpy pillows ... very firm bed but I liked it. Open bathroom not airconditioned with mosquitoes galore. Water pressure in shower so minimal I couldn't wash my hair. I wore thongs whilst trying to shower because of mould and kept watching the mozzies fly by. Staff do their job but do not engage with us patrons. Absolutely no service in pool area with 3 or 4 staff sitting behind counter talking. .. btw only 7 sun lounges around pool that they allow patrons to put towels on and leave for hours. I actually took them off so other guest's could use! But big positives in the rooms are great ... very spacious. The location is good and nice and quiet. The cafe is lovely as it overlooks the pool .. food just okay and the pool and grounds are immaculate. This small complex has so much potential. I only hope the owner reads my review and makes the changes to improve his business. If so I will be back to stay again and bring my large family also.
title: Good and bad at the same time

text:
We stayed at Artemis for 5 nights .We booked a 2 bedroom pool villa. We had great expectations from this villa but were disappointed. Service was ordinary. Rooms were not cleaned properly and on time. The air-conditioning in both the rooms were ineffective. Inspite of complaints, nothing was done to improve our comfort. Two doors were not locking and there were big gaps between the door shutters. However, the pool was fantastic and enjoyed ourselves. The food was ordinary. 
The toilets are not air con ditined and get very warm. It has an open doorway at the back and there was a flimsy curtain put there. The mosquito menace was high due to ope bathroom.
The place can be much better if the management gets inti miute details.
title: Can be better

text: I stayed at Artemis Hotel for two nights, it was supposed to be for just one night but I loved it so much that I extended my stay! It is a beautiful hotel, and everyone who works there are so lovely. As a solo traveller, I felt very safe there and it's in a great location, really close to the beach and shops/restaurants. There was a mistake with my airport pick up, but once I arrived at the hotel they upgraded my room to an apartment as an apology. Amazing service! I would definitely stay there again.
title: A beautiful place to stay!!

text: Although we only spent one night at the Artemis Villa, we were highly impressed with the service, location, and quality of the grounds and room. With a late-night flight far after our checkout time, staff were extremely accommodating in assisting us with luggage storage, transportation, and even a nighttime shower and pool use. The grounds of the hotel were beautiful and our room was clean, spacious, and lovely. Best breakfast out of the four hotels we stayed at in Bali. Would highly recommend this spot.
title: Fabulous service in beautiful hotel

text:
Loved it, huge bed, very comfortable , friendly staff and a good price
I would definitely recommend and would stay again
A few elements a bit run down but nothing to worry about 
Loved it and food was excellent
title: Really great

text: Nothing to really fault about this place. My first time in Bali....had always shunned it for fear of being surrounded by drunk Australians. But this place really is a true oasis. Stayed in a one bedroom garden villa with jacuzzi. So much space, great bed, two tv's, two aircon units, massive living area and huge bedroom. Bathroom was a little rundown, but not too bad and a massive amount of space also. Gardens and pool area is truly beautiful. Don't be too put off by the creepy laneway leading to the villas, I walked that laneway late at night many times on my own and it was fine. Would highly recommend this place.
title: Thank you Artemis

text: The villas and pool area were lovely. Friendly staff, tasty food and very peaceful setting. No noise at all from the nearby traffic. Great position, close to shops, restaurants and beach. Sorry to have to complain about our bathroom, badly needed a good clean and paint. There was a hole in the glass and the rain and dirt were all over the wall. I saw a friends bathroom, and it , too, needed a good scub and clean. Otherwise, a delightful complex.
title: Review

text: Beautiful villa with private outside area pool is stunning and staff very friendly and helpful, villas are located a short walk to beach and restaurants lively bars are a easy taxi ride away just be sure to get metered taxis the staff will organise for you
title: Beautiful

text: From the very friendly welcoming and helpful reception staff to the amazing pool and the super rooms/ apartements- we stayed in an apart - and the place is superb. Location is a bit detached from the street as you need to walk about 100m to reach the street and about 5-7 min to reach jalan seminyak. If you will be hanging around legian and kuta then you must rent a bike ( hotel does rent) otherwise it will be quite costy to hop in and out of the hotel multiple times a day. Also hotel is close to gay bars( in case you like or not)
title: A place in our hearts

text: The location was perfect. The facilities were so good. Loved the pool and eating area. It is a small hotel, so was nice and quiet by the pool. Staff were really helpful. The laneway into the hotel was a little small (even for Bali standards), but was really close to the main road so not a problem.
title: Great Value and Good Location

text:
Beautiful Hotel in Seminyak away from the busy craziness !
amazing pool, room, breakfast and helpful staff
recommend to any one looking for a smaller quieter  hotel 
close to beach, bars, restaurants and shopping also
title: Artemis Hotel

text: Good value for money. Daily breakfast was tasty and good selection. Staff were all really friendly and very helpful with arranging transport. We also got picked up from the airport which worked well. Good access to shopping area, and only 300-400 metres from the beach. Nice pool. Room was nice and big. It was a little tired, but it was really clean and tidy so that wasn't an issue at all. I would certainly recommend for good value.
title: Nice little spot - Good value for money

text:
Tucked away down a quiet laneway lies this beautiful , intimate place. A most unassuming reception area, but once you have been greeted by the friendliest staff and gone through the formalities, you follow your porter down a short path and the beauty of this place opens before you. 
A blue water pool is the centrepiece with ample lounges around it. The open air meals area sits at the othe end, and let me tell you, the freshly cooked breakfast is fantastic. 
Our room was A2, apartment style. Large, very clean with a separate lounge, bedroom and bathroom. Decorated in washed white furniture and a bed the size of a 2 car garage it was excellent. 
A short "Bali " stroll will take you to shopping, restaurants, bars and the beach. 
A 30 minute walk will get you Seminyak square. Or a max of $5 in a cab. 
I would like to thank ALL staff for making this stay most memorable. 
The bathroom was getting tired, as were the window furnishings, but it wouldn't take much to remedy. 
A definite must for those looking to stay in Seminyak.
title: AN OASIS

text:
Stayed here for 7nights and definitely had a pleasant stay. Rooms were consistently clean, which is the main thing I look for in hotels. Towels were always changed and beds made twice a day. 
We stayed in a standard room and felt that we payed a good price for what we got. Rooms were spacious enough and the bed was huge. TV was a bit small, but we barely watched it, apart from the odd night or two if we watched a movie before bed and even then it was fine.
Staff were friendly and polite, everyone always greeted or smiled as we passed them.
Breakfast was always freshly cooked and prepared for us. It's not a buffet but there's lots of options on the menu. I mostly had the continental option, which had a good variety and was more than filling. If I was really hungry I went for the Mie goreng (noodles) or the Nasi Goreng (fried rice). Each option came with fresh fruit, fresh juices and a hot drink, the watermelon juice was my favourite.
The pool is really nice but we only used it twice, seeing as the beach was a 5min walk away.
Location was good - close to the beach, lots of restaurants, market shops, spa's and beauty palours along the main road. Seminyak square is a bit of a walk down, if you don't mind walking then it's fine but if you do then it might be worth catching a taxi.
Definitely would love to come back. Would definitely like to upgrade to the deluxe suites next time. Great stay for couples, nice and relaxing atmosphere, away from the busy neighbouring streets yet close enough to walk to places. You walk down a very tight alley looking street to get the hotel but don't be put off, we've felt completely safe walking to and from our hotel and there's always a security guard at the front of it.
Thanks you Artemis Villa for a great stay! 

Dalaila & Jonathan
title: Great stay at Artemis Villa!

text: Great place to stay - We were collected from the airport by Hotel Driver -Komang - who was excellent, he had great suggestions for restaurants and places to visit. He made our trip so easy and helped us with planning day trips,he has very reasonable rates. Great guy -ask hotel to organise pick up at airport, it makes your arrival so easy, Artemis perfect - staff friendly helpful. Lovely atmosphere. Pool superb. Villa great design and clean.Definitely recommend.
title: Excellent spot - hotel driver very helpful

text: Been staying here now for a few days and have a few more to go.  The apartments and villas are beautiful, well appointed and very comfortable.  The price includes an excellent  breakfast and the food and service are first class.  The staff are efficient but friendly and we would most certainly make Artemis our first choice in Seminyak.   Very peaceful location just down a small side road, yet minutes away from all the bars, cafes and restaurants Seminyak has to offer.   Everything within easy walking distance so no taxi rides needed this trip.   Wonderful place.  Would not hesitate to recommend.
title: Peaceful but within minutes of all attractions

text: The Artemis villa and hotel is a lovely, quiet oasis tucked away down a quiet lane and walking distance to the beach. Friendly, helpful staff, a gorgeous big pool, spa, and in the centre of all the shopping and close to the beach makes this resort a winning location to stay on your next visit to Seminyak. 😊
title: Great place to stay in Seminyak

text:
My husband and two children (5yrs and 7yrs) stayed here for 5 nights in a 2 bedroom pool villa. It was absolutely wonderful. We found the service fantastic, the pool was clean and the food great. 

Please note the second bedroom doesn't have internal access to the rest of the villa (you must go out along the pool to the lounge room). This wasn't an issue for us, but may be for some families. 

The pool in our villa was clean and lovely. Whilst some things in our villa looked a bit 'tired' it was completely offset by the location of the villa (60 secs walk to main Seminyak street), the quietness of the hotel and villas, the friendliness of staff, and the amenities. Great value for money and we just loved staying.
title: Wonderful place to stay

text: Ive stayed in Bali many times and this has to be one of my favourites. Massive rooms with super kingsize beds....small kichen and lounge area with a massive bathroom. All tastefully decorated with high ceilings in a Balinese style. Food was also excellent. If you want your own little cottage in Bali, peace and tranquility....you will struggle to better this...there are also 2 bed villas. Maybe not ideal for families with young children with regards to the size of the pool etc....but my two kids aged 7 and 9, loved it here and the staff were very friendly. Wifi signal in the rooms is sometimes very weak...but overall this is about the best 'value for money'....I've had in Bali and only a 5 minute walk to the beach
title: Simply fantastic

text: This is a quiet hotel facility in the heart of Seminyak.  We stayed in a studio room which was large, spacious and clean, with a room service twice daily. It had the biggest bed I have ever seen!  The bathroom is kind of open air, large and clean. I believe there are also private villas and appartments within the same complex.    There is a delightful shared pool area and nice restaurant with good selection off food and drinks at reasonable prices.  Only an 80 metre stroll to the main street with lots of bars, restaurants, massages and shops.  Perhaps a 10/15 minute walk to the beach which is a hive of activity and restaurants.  Overall very impressed and would definitely stay here again.
title: Hidden Oasis

text: A quiet hotel in the heart of seminyak. Very Close to shops and 10 min walk to the beach. Beautiful pool area and clean rooms with large beds. Staff are very friendly and ready to help. Also got a free massage with our 3 night stay! - which was excellent. Very happy with our choice of accomodation in Seminyak!
title: Loved it!

text: Artemis is in an ideal, central location just off a main thoroughfare, a very short walk to shops, massages and restaurants, but it is quiet and restful.  We booked a 2br garden villa (G1) which is just near the pool and restaurant.  The 2 bedrooms were well furnished with good bathrooms, Ac, good storage and a comfy bed.  The kitchen/living area was very basic in that it had no AC, very little in cooking utensils, and a simple dining setting.  It is not a self catering kitchen as it held basic utensils only.  It did have a water cooler which was great.  The villa also lacked any outdoor setting 9seats or sunbeds) in the private enclosure.  The shared pool was terrific, the restaurant serviceable, breakfast adequate.  As a mid range option we really enjoyed our stay here and with the beach only a short walk away it is recommended!
title: 4 Nights in 2 Bedroom Villa

text:
Four of us stayed in a two-bedroom villa for four nights. We were right near the pool and restaurant. Artemis is down a laneway and a short walk to many shops and restaurants. The beach is a slightly longer walk away.
Breakfast was reasonable, nothing outstanding. Air con in the bedrooms was good but no air con in the shared living area. The hotel could do with a few finishing touches, the fridge didn't keep things ultra cold but was good enough (get ice from the bar), our room had a water cooler, staff were friendly. We'll be back here for a few nights at the end of our stay.
title: A lovely oasis in Seminyak

text:
We booked a self catering unit in this resort through AirBnB for about $500 for the week. It gets serviced everyday except Sunday, which is included. It's a five minute walk to Seminyak beach. Has a great swimming pool and very friendly staff at the front desk. I wouldn't go out of my way to suggest the Restuarant, as there are many better choices close by. 
It also includes free wifi, as most places do.
title: Great location with friendly staff

text: We simply were not expecting paradise, but recieved it staying here! Everything exceeded any and all expectations. We stayed in A-4 which was directly beside the restaurant. Our breakfast was another pleasant surprise we looked forward to each morning. My daughter left a couple items there which they stored at the front desk when we returned later in the week to pick up on our way to the airport.
title: Amazing

text:
This was our 2nd stay at Artemis & simply cannot fault this little oasis.
Food in restaurant was great along with breakfast daily .... Staff are always happy & helpful. Pool is clean, inviting & relaxing. Would continue to stay here ... Thank you Artemis xxx
title: Peace & quiet ....

text: Just stayed with the family we had to Villas as we had 12 people and must say the rooms were brilliant lots of rooms space... staff were very helpful and always happy. Meals were yummy. Not far from restaurant's and shops. Always clean, would recommend to anyone thank you
title: Fantastic

text: We stayed in a villa with a small plunge pool in the back.  The villa was huge with a large bed, sitting room and good sized bathroom with shower and bath.  It was very clean and quiet being a short walk away from the main road.  We had a complimentary massage which was very relaxing for the first day of our honeymoon. It was a short walk from the shops and about 10-15 minute walk to the beach. Would definitely stay here again.
title: Peaceful and relaxing

text: I booked 2 nights and 2 rooms for myself and a friend. We were upgraded to a 2 bedroom garden villa which was nice. The garden was actually just grass with no chairs but the pool and restaurant was just outside our door so it didn't really matter. The rooms were good, clean, nice big bed, good aircon, big bathroom ( one with bath) excellent shower. The pool isn't huge but it never had many people around it so it was big enough. Breakfast is a la carte but good. It's in a good location. The walk back from the shops etc is now lit. Good value for the price and location.
title: Quiet and convenient

text:
We stayed 3 days at Artemis Villa and after the nice experience we decided to repeat from 24th to 28th march 2016 for another 4 days.

The place is on the Seminyak main road to the beach (5 minutes away by walk to the beach) next to all nice bars and restaurants but at the same time is a so so quiet place, you can't hear any noise. The pool is the best of the Artemis Villa, no words to explain how beautiful it is, we had an amazing chilling time in there.
Breakfast and the pool restaurant food is delicious and the menu very complete, rooms and apartments are very big, comfortable and with lots of nice details.
The reception & pool restaurant staff was very nice at all the time and very helpful with everything we needed, same as bellboys and housekeeping team. Everything was extremely clean!
Wifi was working perfectly and all around the resort during all out stay, honestly...we couldn't choose better, thank you so much guys to make our holidays unforgettable.

Gerardo Moreno
Spain
title: Best Relation quality&price

text: This was our second visit and little had changed. Pool is fantastic and gardens immaculate. The cheaper rooms have no pool view but a charming inside. We had room Hi which was not so closed in. Management were great and when we voiced our disappointment at not having a pool view they did provide a free massage and the opportunity to move when a room became available. If you require a nice quiet location but not far from the action this is it. Also only 10 minute walk to the beach. PLEASE PROVIDE LARGER TV SCREENS.
title: Peacefull but close to the action.

text: What an amazing place to stay in the back quiet streets of Seminyak! Would highly recommend. Very spacious rooms and amazing bathroom. Would definitely be back and highly recommended! Great breakfast too. Friendly & helpful staff that offered great service at breakfast. The pool was a great size and the perfect temperature to swim in.
title: Beautiful, peaceful and quiet place

photos.caption: What a beautiful place to stay in the back streets of Seminyak! Would highly recommended and wou
What a beautiful place to stay in the back streets of Seminyak! Would highly recommended and wou
What a beautiful place to stay in the back streets of Seminyak! Would highly recommended and wou
What a beautiful place to stay in the back streets of Seminyak! Would highly recommended and wou
What a beautiful place to stay in the back streets of Seminyak! Would highly recommended and wou

text: Stayed in Artemis just the two nights, and had a really comfortable, relaxing stay. The hotel grounds and pool are clean and well kept. The studio room is fairly simple with all the usual necessities. The staff and room service are excellent. We took a driver for the day who was really friendly and efficient, took us to all the places we wanted to go without a hitch. For the price we paid, the hotel really impressed.
title: Beautiful

text: We stayed at the Artemis villa and hotel for one night during a quick 2 day tour. The location of the hotel is off the main street in seminyak; ideal for those who prefer a quiet place and yet not away from the main shopping and eating places. The staff at the hotel was very professional and took really good care of our needs. We enjoyed the massage at the SPA but breakfast could have had more options. Its better to have food outside the hotel as there isnt much of a selection. The Villa /room was well designed (we loved it!)...
title: Quick Tour to Bali

text: Stayed here with a family of 7. The P villa was incredible. Staff were super polite and always willing to help us book our daily activities and sightseeing. The complementary breakfast was great with a nice selection to choose from. There were also many restaurants nearby and the beach only minutes away. Will definitely be staying here again!
title: Great place to stay!

text: We stayed here for 3 nights and has booked a one bedroom villa.  The rooms were clean, tidy and spacious!  The staff were extremely helpful and friendly.  I had left my phone in a taxi.  The front desk staff rang the taxi company and the driver for me.  I was extremely lucky to receive my phone back!!  The rooms were private and quiet and the breakfast was sufficient.  The location of the hotel was within walking distance to shops, restaurants and bars.  We were really happy with the service we received and enjoy our stay at the villa.  The only frustration was the lack of wifi connection in the bedroom. Would definitely consider returning in the future.
title: Excellent service and big rooms

text: Great place and good service. The room we stayed in had a huuuuge bed...great for  a romantic getaway. All facilities were great and very close to town..although very quiet too. Food was basic but very tasty. Rooms very spacious and clean. Very cheap and clean accommodation...wld stay again.
title: Worlds biggest beds haha

text: We booked a 2 bedroom garden villa at Artemis for the 2nd time in 2 years and were again delighted. Friendly and helpful staff, great food, lovely clean safe villas and beautiful pool and gardens. A haven from the bustle of Seminyak and an easy walk to the beach, shops and great restaurants. But the friendly, welcoming and warm staff ( Bagus and team) are what makes these villas the best value in Seminyak for families, young and old. We will be back.!
title: Fabulous family stay

text:
21 of us stayed at Artemis for a hens weekend in October. We booked the 4 bedroom villa, 3 bedroom and a couple if single rooms. We had an amazing time...the hotel & villas were beautiful & the staff were willing to go above & beyond to cater to our large group.
Would definitely stay again :-)
title: Amazing!

text: We stayed in a 2 bedroom garden villa it was fantastic ! The location was right at the restaurant and pool. The villas  are tucked away , yet close to everything . We would stay again, lovely staff beautiful food. Close to shops and walk to the beach it is small and peaceful
title: Loved our stay

text:
I can't say much about Artemis, as we arrived at nearly midnight, and departed at 8:00 the next morning.  However, after a long flight, the stay was friendly, helpful, and efficient.  The room was nice, cooled down quickly after the A/C was turned on, and the bathroom was a nice, large,outdoor bathroom.

The room was quiet and comfortable,and our free breakfast was delicious!  Wish we could have spent more time here.

For packing tips:  the hotel provides shampoo, conditioner, soap, and insect repellent.
title: Great stay!

text:
Artemis has a ambience about it and is a peaceful retreat in the craziness of Bali, lovely villa layout 2 or 1 bedroom with or without own pool. Price was reasonable and food was good, even though it's down a ally way it's well lit at night and always has security waiting for you, walking distance to beach but was very hot while we where there and I was not impressed with the beach when we got there,have to go out of town to find nice beaches, there shared pool was nice but have to get in early for a sun lounge, the air conditioning is only in the bedroom but if you keep the rest of the villa closed it will cool everything except the open bathroom, beds where a little hard for me but I like a soft bed which seems to be hard to find when travelling.
Overall a very enjoyable place to stay, thankyou to the staff that were vey helpful in making arrangements for us and have very good drivers Maday.
title: Oasis in the middle of the craziness

text: For those who don't like hotels with hundreds of rooms, for group of people who would like to stay together, and visit lots of place in Seminyak without losing time on the roads, this place offers a tranquil place, with more than enough facilities, from library/internet, pool, bar, small resto. Rate is very reasonable, starting at A$ 130 for a villa which is good for a couple with small kids. Interesting architecture, very friendly staff. As for foods: there are many eateries nearby where we can get better food. Cleanliness: could be better. Overall: great value. Tip: don't drive a 'humvee' to this place, it is located in a narrow road (local: Gang), only good for small car.
title: A very nice small place to stay in the center of Seminyak

text: We had 5 Night's at the Artemis hotel and could not be happier with our choice. The staff were both friendly and very helpful. The hotel is just off the main street which to make it very quiet place to stay. The hotel is 10 minute walk to the beach and is near some very good restaurant's. I highly recommend the Artemis hotel and would stay again next time we are in Bali.
title: Nice place to stay

text:
Great place w friendly staff.
close to shopping and massages w a quick walk to the beach.
 great leather shop close by and also roof top bars and great restaurants. close to Ku De Ta beach club/bar/restaurant. a must if your in the area.
stay by the villa next to the pool or the one directly opposite the restaurant.
biggest bed I have ever stayed in,,, ever, and also great bathroom.
title: SEMINYAK ACCOM BALI

text: Stayed In Two bedroom Villa, lovely setting, private pool. Staff could not do enough to assist. Great location, quiet but close to all you need. Can certainly recommend if you want to get away and truely feel like you are getting a well deserved holiday.
title: Perfect

text:
We stayed in the villa jacuzzi which like our own little hideaway, The great thing is the bedroom and ensuite are separate from the lounge/ living area allowing one person to sleep in and another to put the coffee on and read a book & relax. 
The restaurant area over looks the nice pool area and serves a good breakfast by happy friendly staff.  Thank you Artemis for a great relaxing holiday.
title: Relaxation in comfort

text:
We stayed here as a couple for three nights in a studio room. The bed was super kingsize and very comfortable and the bathroom was huge with a separate bath and shower. This is not a 5 star resort and the rooms are a little dated, but perfectly adequate and quite charming with a soaring roof.

The breakfast/dining area is open and overlooks the brilliant blue pool surrounded by palm trees and beautiful gardens. The food is very good and the service is excellent.

This is an oasis hidden down an lane way, very peaceful and serene. Just two minutes walk and you into the hustle and bustle of a busy shopping street. What more could you want?
title: A hidden oasis

text:
We were here for 3 nights in A1 it was close to the pool. The villa is great, clean and spacios.They have a pool table near the bar.The staff is very helpfull and friendly they do a great job!!!! The breakfast was good. The pool was clean and warm for a bath :).
Thank you for all! I recommend this great hotel!
title: Great place

text:
I stayed four nights in August.  I stayed in a 'studio' and half a day in an apartment.  They are lovely.  The pool and restaurant areas are also lovely.  The breakfast was great.  Good choice.  Beautifully poached eggs!

It is in a quiet back street in a quieter part of Seminyak.  5-10 minute walk to the beach.  

The staff were great, friendly, attentive and helpful.  I organised a day trip to Ubud with their driver.  It was good and well priced.

My only complaint (and why it didn't get 5 stars) is the wifi in the rooms didn't work.  By the pool and the restaurant was fine.  I complained and was told it was 'fixed' a few times then gave up.
title: Beautiful, quiet hotel

text: I was in Bali in June'15 and stayed at Artemis Villa and Hotel. It is situated in Seminyak and very close to shopping, massages and great restaurants . I found the property excellent with great service . Will recommend travellers to go for it.
title: Amazing Hotel

text: The hôtel is in a very quiet area, close to the main street and to the beach (max 5 min walking). The staff is so friendly and do everything to make you happy. The room is very beautifull and huge close to the swimming pool. Breakfast is very good and the restaurant aswell.  You can book at artemis you will enjoy it.
title: Perfect place to finish our trip

text: Spacious and very nice rooms, amazing pool, close to the beach, friendly and helpful staff, highly relaxed atmosphere, great breakfasts and food, close to local restaurants and bars, driver is also very good
title: Quiet oasis

text: Booked the 2bedroom villa with pool, a very peaceful location even though it was just a min walk to the main road where many restaurants and pubs are located over there. The staff are very friendly and helpful that added my stay to feel so homely. It was just 5 min away from Seminyak Beach where U can catch their beautiful sunset. Overall thumbs up except their air con is not cold enough. Think is time they need servicing :)
title: Wonderful Stay With Great Location.

text: Stayed for two nights in one bedroom apartment and can't believe how much space we got for the price. Charming furniture and furnishings, a huge bed, spacious bathroom, only average hot water (could be warmer ). Popped in to see the outdoor area of a two bedroom pool villa and very impressed, sunny pools hard to find in smaller villas. The hotel pool area is perfect, plenty of sun and some shade, crystal clear water. The restaurant is attractive and comfortable. Loved everything about this place and the location is excellent, very close to the beach. Would definitely stay here again as a couple or with the family. Would be perfect for large groups as all sorts of accom available. Also the booing via email with Melda was efficient and organised. So happy to have discovered another small charming hotel.
title: Beautiful boutique accom

photos.caption: Love the bue and white theme through out the whole complex
Great juices at breaky, creamy yoghurt

text: Currently staying here and it's one of the prettiest hotels I've been to. Very tasteful, smiling service, not far from the beach. Unfortunately, the way the bathrooms are constructed allows many creatures to come in uninvited...and the thought of encountering the rodent at night is not a pleasant one. They have no mouse trap and can do nothing to help. So fingers crossed...
title: Great place but the most in the room...

text: Quiet area but closer to lots of restaurants and walking distance from the beach. villas nicely done, did not really trust the pool condition. breakfast was OK could have been better. overall nice place if you looking for calm and peaceful time.
title: Good Place

text: My partner and I were so impressed with our first stay at Artemis we decided to stay again when returning to Seminyak 2 years later. Artemis offers clean, modern accommodation, close to all the amenities of one of Seminyak's main streets, Camplung Tanduk. It is situated on a back street, a short walk from this road, which enables it to achieve a setting of peace and tranquility despite its central location. It's a quick walk to the beach, and a short taxi ride to well known "Eat street." The staff were just as helpful and friendly the second time around-a testimony to the sound service and consistency of quality Artemis has to offer. I would not hesitate to recommend Artemis to others.
title: Our Second Stay

text:
We had a wonderful experience staying at the Artemis Villa & Hotel! 
We were traveling with our adult son, so we rented a 2 bedroom, 2 bath villa with private pool. It was very large and tastefully decorated, we had our own space with Wi-Fi and breakfast was included. I was a little skeptical about previous reviews telling about the long alley/driveway, but it was well-lit at night and added to the overall seclusion of the hotel. The hotel staff was always accommodating, friendly and flexible: we could have breakfast in the restaurant by the main pool, in our own villa, or "grab n go" when we had to leave early one morning. There was live music at the bar/restaurant by the pool a couple of evenings. The restaurant served full meals (although we didn't partake there). One thing to note: the bedrooms in the villa were air-conditioned, but nothing else was...ie. the bathrooms (one off of each bedroom) are open air--very clean and nice and very modern, but they were warm and humid. We do enjoy very high end hotels as a general rule, but we also appreciate the local flavor one can get from the smaller, boutique experiences like this one. Personally, I enjoy the warmth and humidity--nights were especially pleasant-- and it added to the overall ambiance and experience of Bali. 

I liked the quiet and seclusion, yet it was centrally located in Seminyak- near shops and restaurants and only a 10 minute walk to the beach. 

When we arrived the bedrooms had a strong scent of incense/hot oils... ? We do not like these strong scents, so we extinguished everything quickly and fresh air took over!
title: A Wonderful Experience!

text:
well appointed large rooms with separate kitchen/lounge dining area. These have a large private outdoor bathroom - which is a must in Bali.
Whilst the room we stayed in did not have its own private pool others do, and the central pool area is quite good anyway. The room service was good as was the restaurant. Staff were friendly and an enjoyable stay.

Wifi was good
title: Stunning and spacious

text:
Pieceful resort in Seminyak, about 500m from the beach and within 10 minute walking. The resort is located in a small alley/backstreet of a more busy road. It gives a very calm and quiet environment.
Overall the resort was in piece, but some (in our case Australian families) can make some noise especially around the poolside. This was especially noticed during breakfast, since the terrace/restaurant is next to the pool. 

Breakfast can be ordered by 4 choices: Continental, American, Japanese or Indonesian style. Juice is made fresh and you can choose the flavour. But everyday the same breakfast is a bit boring though. We prefer a buffet style or more variation at least.

The room:

On arrival in the room, a staff brought a welcome drink (water/lime juice).

Several room types available. The regular room we had features a double or twin bed, large size and nice quiet airconditioner, plus a fan. A television with clear receive and interesting channels is a plus here. There are also quite a few power outlets, good for charging devices (works also when you leave the room, so you can charge throughout the day if needed).
The badroom was older style with brown tiles. Since it is open air on one side, you need to burn the anti-mosquito sticks at night especially. Power of water in the shower is limited at times, and water temperature is fluctuating, though at an acceptable level. Soap and some other amenities are provided for.
One point we didn't like: old worn towels with old stains visible. Also the smell of these towels was not so pleasant, despite being clean. We advise the hotel to invest in new towels (a rather small investment to gain more customer satisfaction for sure).

Garden:
nicely done, clean and well kept flora, a shared pool is in the centre of it. The pool is not so big or deep, but fine for a dip on hot days. There are 8 or 10 sunbeds available.

Connectivity:
WiFi provided for free. Rooms have sometimes no/weak signal. Around the pool/restaurant acceptable signal and speed.
A library/internet room is available, but we tried to get online once and the desktop PC didn't even start up to the normal windows settings, so we gave up. Books, left behind by other guests, can be taken from hear to read. Plenty of languages available ;)

To do:

The beach is 500m away by foot, 10 minutes max. Several beachbars are open till around 11pm/midnight serving drinks and simple food. The street outside the hotel also caters to 3 (famous) gaybars in Bali, and get very busy every night. So, don't be afraid if you get some attention from the (lady)boys :) Main shopping street is around 500m away, a large cheap supermarket (Bintang Market) is on Seminyak Square (1km distance).

Overall, we can recommend this small resort. We give it 3*+ for comfort, quality and services. But it cannot qualify for 4* level.

Note:
Originally we booked a longer stay in Artemis Seminyak, but since we had to travel to another hotel we took the possible option to shorten our stay. The frontdesk manager was kind to accept this, despite some discussions about it. Nevertheless, there was no cancellation policy stated on the booking form (directly booked via e-mail), and therefore there were no grounds to pay an additional night as requested for at first.
title: Pieceful small resort near Seminyak Beach

text:
Artemis Villa & Hotel has got wonderful staff that make your whole stay just perfect - a big thank you goes to Baggus who was so friendly and helpful - but thanks has to go to all the staff who really made our stay special. 

The accommodation is super quiet even though it's just a few minutes to a busy Seminyak street that has some bars and restaurants. It's also very close to the beach which is great for heading down in the afternoon to watch sunset, grab a few drinks and listen to some live music. 

Breakfast is superb with a good choice of options - continental, American, Japanese and Indonesian. 

There is a lovely pool for cooling off in, with the only slight downside being lack of space surrounding the pool to laze in - it all feels a little close and if the hotel is full, there could be no loungers available. But there is the beach down the street, so it's not the end of the world! 

I highly recommend this place for those who want to be close to amenities, but be able to get away from it all to chill out too.
title: Lovely quiet accommodation close to the beach

text:
Love love love it here!
We booked a double but due to availability problems were upgraded to a suite which was beautiful. The bed was huge and could have easily fitted 5 people in (we didn't try) and everything was very modern and zen and above all very clean (the staff came i twice a day and even wanted to clean while we were eating breakfast on check out day (normally I thought hotels didn't bother if you were leaving so that was nice). We had an outdoor bathroom and a kitchenette if we needed it so this would have made a great pad if we were staying longer and is definately big enough for at least one probably two children too. The pool was very refreshing after a day haggling in the stores and although it didn't get loads of sun it was a great place to relax.
The food was delicious including the breakfast and reasonably priced and there was a cute library and business centre if you needed it. Wifi worked well so always a bonus and the staff were very very very friendly! Book it now. 
We saw inside a pool villa too and that also looked great but in my opinion if you have kids you would be fine in a suite.
title: A secluded haven in Seminyak

text:
Once you get past the dark uneven alleyway leading to the this place, you really do escape all the noise, hustle and bustle of the street. 
We stayed in P villa which housed eight of us and were joined by 10 other family members. 
The private villas that everyone had were great (but don't expect much in the way of cooking facilities in P - we ate out all the time anyway but a kettle would have been nice).
The breakfast was repeatedly very good and made fresh to your order, none of those help yourself buffet set ups. 
The staff are good and very friendly, if sometimes a little slow - but hey, relax, you're on holiday. 
It's a good location very close to the the shops and restaurants and only a five minute walk to a wonderful beach (avoid the terrible pot holes in the pavements though - if you have any mobility issues, you'll need to get a taxi to get anywhere).
title: A relaxing retreat

text: This hotel has everything you will need for a totally chilled break. Down a back alley from the madness of Seminyaks streets, it's not as scarey as it first appears. From the minute you arrive the staff make you feel welcome. Their aim is to make sure you have a wonderful holiday. Service is amazing and nothing too much trouble. We stayed in the 1bed garden villa which has its own outdoor tub. All rooms air conditioned and everything you could need. You won't use the kitchen as the hotel breakfast is good and varied and the choice of restaurants within walking distance is amazing. There's nothing to dislike about this hotel. It is truly wonderful. The wifi in the rooms though is hopeless..
title: A peaceful haven

text:
I stayed in Apartment A2 with my wife and 4years old kid for 4 days in first week of Apr2015.

Good Points:
> Peaceful and stylish hotel
> Beautiful and spacious room
> Perfect small kid friendly Pool
> Courteous staff with good service

Neutral Points:
> location: 10-12 mins to reach Seminyak beach.
3-4 mins to reach main road. Despite special lighting by hotel, in night that lane is very dark and spooky. (See my shared pics)
> Okay restaurant

Bad Points:
> air-con was not effective. technician checked compressor and aircon multiple times and confirmed that he can not do anything. Apparently, we need to keep aircon running for 3-4 hours at least to make it effective.. no instant cooling in super hot Bali weather.
Last night of our stay, hotel manager offered us to use spare Villa to sleep because of this aircon issue.
>wifi was not working many time. very slow also. This is not a big point though.

Strange incident:
One day when we came from outside, we found that main gate of our room was open. Moreover we told specifically earlier not to clean our room that day. After discussion we found that there was some communication gape. I gave them benefit of doubt, as the hotel staff were honest.

I'll definitely come back again because of hotel ambiance, peacefulness and staff.
But I hope rather than blaming Bali's weather ;) , they will replace old aircons with effective new ones, as it is unbearable to face hot Bali weather without effective aircons.
title: Good peaceful ambiance

text: This villa and hotel is stunning. Set off the Main Street it is a secret paradises we arrived at 12am the night of our first stay. Reception is 24hr and the staff are so helpful! We got an upgrade from a studio to an apartment. The place is spotless 10/10! Would definitely come back
title: Tropical paradise

text: Great location, within easy walking distance to the beach, great restaurants, terrific staff with beautiful villa's in a small boutique complex. Breakfast was made to order, the main hotel pool was fabulous, no complaints.
title: Boutique hotel and villas

text:
Great little hotel, with large rooms and private villas.  Pool is beautiful, and a great place to enjoy the wonderful breakfast they serve each morning.  Within easy walking distance to the beach and Seminyak nightlife.

Lucky Day bar, about 200 yards away, is the best watering hole, with beers at 18,0000 (about $1.30 US).  And a very friendly staff.

Beach in Seminyak is MUCH cleaner than in Kuta.  Crowd is a little older, but much less hassling from the vendors and drivers.
title: Great Hotel in Seminyak

text: For a small hotel this would be one of the best places we have stayed in Bali. Rooms are large and the pool is fantastic. The breakfast was first class as was the other meals especially the Nasa Goring. Prices at the bar were very competitive so that's probably the reason they ran out of spirits and small Bintang. Do not be put off by the long Gang in to the hotel its worth the short walk.
title: Please stock the bar

text:
The grounds are beautiful, it's like a little oasis from the hustle & bustle of Seminyak. The staff are lovely & the place is efficiently run (rooms cleaned whilst you breakfast etc). The pool area is very clean & pretty & not crowded. We had an apartment directly next to the pool & it was spacious, bright & tastefully decorated. We stayed seven nights & really enjoyed our stay, however the management needs to take note of the following....
1. The bathroom is full of chalk stains & needs a good refurbish. Half the decorative stones were missing around the bath?
2. Cleaning needs to improve- our fridge was dirty.
3. The towels are disgusting-old, tattered & smelly- buy new ones!
4. The breakfast coffee & juice are awful! The orange juice is like radioactive orange- just sugar! The coffee is instant.
5.the  beds are old & creaky, we could feel the springs in our back. These along with the towels need replacing asap.

If management took note of these things it would be excellent.
title: Very good but also a few things need a serious look at...

text: We have just stayed at this resort and had a very relaxing time.  Our first room was a hotel room and this was really nice apart from all the Mosquitoes but then again it is the rainy season in Bali and the humidity did not help the active mossies.  We were upgraded to an apartment for a couple of days and this was lovely with pool views and we had mossie nets over our beds. The staff were very friendly and the peacefulness of the hotel was just lovely. We would definitely stay here again as the location was great and good eateries on your door step, close to beach.
title: Extreme Bliss

text:
I have been in Bali for just under a month and after spending 3 nights at Artemis during the beginning of my trip I HAD to bring my friends back to stay there once they arrived! 

The staff are fantastic, very helpful and always smiling. The rooms are great for short or long stays and the pool is beautiful - it got a lot of use from us! The only possible negative is that the air-conditioning within the living areas of each room i stayed in couldn't cope with the heat and kept these areas stuffy and hot, the bedrooms however were beautiful and cool.

The food is to a really good standard with a lot of options to chose from whether you are adventurous OR picky with your taste. 

The spa is lovely and relaxing, easy to make an appointment and quite a lot to chose from.

I found the location to be perfect. Very short walk to the beach where you can eat and drink upon beanbags on the sand at sunset, short drive to the main Seminyak eat/shopping area and very easy to find a taxi. There are many restaurants and bars around the area too.

WILL be coming back, value for money!
title: Amazing accommodation in good location!

text:
We recommend this hotel, We appreciated our staying and especially the practicality of location offered by this hotel (Dhyana Pura street). We took a standard room (without private pool).

Positive points
- Hotel is quite beautifully designed, nice “tropical atmosphere” of the main swimming pool area and the rooms. I appreciate the small garden square in our room
- The lobby team is very helpful with their advices
- Close to many shops, that are open 24/24 (some other parts of Seminiak looks very empty at night)
- Breakfast on the combined restaurant swimming pool areais the best moment of the day : you can choose between 4 different breakfasts (american, Indonesian, Japanese or continental). we tried them all, they are all tasty.
- no bugs or other insects (a very common thing in other hotels in Bali)
- Cleaning service in our room was always done in our 20 mn breakfast time, .. the guys were very efficient to have a look on us and do their cleaning service at that moment !!!

Negative points
- Hotel is not located directly on Dhyana Pura street, but on the bottom of an 80 meters alley that is paved only on its half. If you have a heavy suitcase, you could not move it on its wheels, especially when it rains.
title: well designed hotel (tropical atmosphere), practical location close to shops

photos.caption: bathroom with a square of tropical garden

text:
We stayed in 4 bedroom villa with private pool & had one of d best holidays at Artemis. Their service is excellent & staff very courteous. 
We specially enjoyed the new year party on 31st night, it was well organised and we are thankful to the management for arranging for veg food esp for us.
title: Wonderful villas , very good service, absolute value for money

text: I have nothing but good to say about Artemis Villa! Staff was so helpful and nice, our family (5 adults) had the most wonderful time in our two bedroom villa. Rooms were stylish, clean and very cozy. Breakfast was really tasty and fresh. Pool area was beautiful, clean and quiet. Location is excellent, just 10 minutes from the beach and few minutes from the shops.
title: Wonderful place to stay!

text:
Spent 5 days at Artemis (2 adults, 2 kids) and could not find fault with the place. We arrived 1 hour before check-in time ( I had only booked 2 hours beforehand) and without hesitation they showed us to our apartment. Friendly greeting, full of smiles they couldn't have been more helpful. 
The one bedroom apartment was great, clean, spacious and right beside the pool, literally 5 steps to our own little loungers and a further 2 steps into the pool. Plenty of staff around the restaurant and bar and ready to serve food, beer or cocktails. 
A cosy little pool area, great little kids area and mini whirlpool. The grounds and pool are immaculate, countless members of staff always cleaning, sweeping or just saying hello when they walked by. 
It's in a great location just down a side alley off the Main Street, the alley is reasonably lit at night and we never felt uneasy at any time walking day or night. Plenty of restaurants, bars within 150 meters of the hotel. 
I could go on but I honestly couldn't fault this hotel, the main stand out being the service and general pleasantness of all the staff. 
A big thank you to Bagus, Putu, Bella and Wawan, they were superb. We would and will definitely be staying there again and would definitely recommend this hotel to everybody. 

Thanks guys, great stay and a great holiday
Glen
title: Home from home

text: Great place to stay. Inexpensive, walking distance from the Seminyak tourist area and from the beach. The room was nice and with a hint of new age look which is a good for a place like that. The bathroom is made in such a way that you have the impression of showering in the jungle...it is amazing. Breakfast was good and the wifi worked pretty well. The staff was nice and very helpful.
title: In the middle of the tourist area

text: Myself and my 4 children stayed here late Nov 2014.  There is not one negative comment I can make about this place - it was PERFECT! The staff were soooo friendly, helpful, polite and caring.  The villa we rented had its own private pool which was perfect as it was so private and always sparkling clean.  There was also the main pool they could use also which they loved too. Our accommodation was cleaned/tidied daily and was lovely and clean upon arrival.  The cold flannels and fresh orange juice given to us upon arrival was also a lovely touch and gratefully received after the HOT journey from the airport and after 18hours of travel from London.  The breakfast was always delicious and fresh and delivered to our table within 10 minutes of ordering - more than adequate amount too.  The villas are down an alley way off the main street to the beach so extremely quiet, private and peaceful.  Walking down the alley at night I never felt unsafe - no stray dogs hanging about, well lit up and a security guard on duty 24/7.  It was seriously only a 5 minute walk to the beach and sooooo close to some amazing restaurants, bars and the fantastic Seminyak shops.  Don't hesitate to book in here, I am seriously fussy when it comes to accommodation and was very worried about going to Bali with 4 children and no husband, but this place took all my concerns away.  You will NOT be disappointed - worth every penny!!!!!!!
title: PERFECT in every possible way

text:
Just spent a week at Artemis with my wife & we totally enjoyed ourselves. Our apartment was right in front of the pool and a short stroll to the restaurant. The rooms are a touch tired but very well looked after. Breakfast is great with multiple choices but the highlight for us was the pool and the pool area. We had a ball relaxing by and in the pool.
Stay at Artemis Villa and Hotel if your looking for a refuse from Seminyak but still close enough to the beach restaurants and shops.
Highly recommended!!
title: RELAX RELAX

text: This was my eighth stay at the Artemis in Seminyak and notwithstanding some minor let downs (towels not fluffy, some mould in one bathroom) it is still my number one hotel in this area. Why? I love the cooked to order breakfast, fresh lime juices through the day, the heavenly pool area and proximity to Jalan Legian (great shopping, Spa Bali, many restaurants and cafes) and the beach. The owner Made and staff however make the Artemis - they are delightful and responsive to any need. If you want a quiet oasis in the middle of Seminyak this is the one.
title: Baik, baik!

text:
We stayed here for two nights on a long weekend trip, and after reading some of the recent reviews I was a little nervous about our stay....but it turned out to wonderful and really great value for the location.  We booked a 1 bedroom studio, and it was pretty much as expected.

In contrast to some other reviews, we found the staff to be very friendly/helpful, the property to be well maintained (it's not brand new, but then we'd expect to pay much more for something brand new!), and breakfast to be quite filling (there are 4 choices - continental, American, Japanese, or Indonesian, all set meals).  Also, the staff were proactive against the mozzies, especially as it's now the rainy/monsoon season, they would light mosquito coils in the bathroom (which was open air) and provided lots of options for us for the main room (enclosed), although we ended up not needing anything else.  We stayed at the W Seminyak prior and actually had more bug bites from that stay!

If there are any criticisms, the studio villas are a bit dark at night (as one reviewer stated) and the bed is on the firmer side (although we still slept quite well).  But these were really minor to us.

Finally, we were really happy with the drivers they organized for us - very professional, and English-speaking (one also spoke fluent Japanese); especially the day trip driver who took us to the Ubud area, and completely customized our trip based on our changing asks and the changing weather.
