The bedrooms are air conditioned which was fine but the bathrooms attached did not have air conditioning either. Going to the bathroom was sometimes like walking into an oven.
On top of this we booked a private pool. But on arrival I discovered there was no outside seating. After approaching reception I was told they had 2 outdoor deck chairs that were broken and that the complex was fully booked and no lounges were currently available and the earliest we could get some outdoor seating was tomorrow.  Not acceptable given it was so hot inside the living room and outside only had decking and pebbles which was uncomfortable to sit on. After breakfast I approached reception and was told I would have 1 lounge by 9 am and would need to wait until midday for a second one. Given it is a 2 bedroom villa shouldn’t they have 4 lounges and therefore have spares – we only needed 2. We went out at 11 am and returned at 5 pm and  still only 1 deckchair. So much for customer service.
Other issues
-the bedrooms had TV but the living area did not 
-Only 1 key for a 2 bedroom Villa which sleeps 4. What happens if someone wants to go back to bed early? 
Overall given this is not a cheap hotel and this is was a very frustrating and unacceptable experience
title: Frustrating and Unacceptable

text: the interior of the rooms in the villa were breathaking , it was truely a dream come true to see such a magnificient design work in the villa. i would go back for the firendly staff, cozy nice pool facing coffee shop, quite and nice off the beach hotel but extremely admirable, it was a pleasure staying here, close to all the exciting joints in the area.
title: Splendid property

text:
I have just stayed 8 nights with a friend at the Artemis Villa & Hotel. We have had a great stay enjoying the peace of this little oasis. We stayed in a 2 bedroom garden villa which was very comfortable & gave us plenty of room to relax. Other villa's & rooms looked equally comfortable. The service was excellent from all of the staff who were all constantly smiling & ready to chat. The rooms were serviced twice a day whilst our privacy was maintained. The gardens were immaculate with the gardeners constantly caring for the area & the pool.  The restaurant & reception staff were helpful with anything we requested & ensured we had all the right information required to venture out & about. The breakfast menu was fine but may not be as good as some bigger resort breakfasts you may have experienced. Having said this you would never be hungry. 
The villa is a few minutes walk to the beach or to the specialty shops of Seminak. There are plenty of restaurants within walking distance & we always felt safe in the area. 'Bella' who worked in the restaurant was always happy & willing to share stories of her family life in country Bali giving us insight into how life was lived. Some other reviewers talked of the angry dog at the entrance to the lane. All we found was a couple of docile dogs that never moved when we passed by. The staff are definitely the highlight of this accommodation. I would recommend staying here if you are looking for a peaceful & friendly place to stay in Seminyak.
title: Oasis

text:
We went to Artemis Villa 31 of December 2012 with 2 children of 4 and 7 years.
Our villa completely met our expectations:
- the private pool was big enough to swim and play (and it was clean and comfortable both the day and night)
- the villa had all the necessary tools for a little family party
- the location allowed to walk to the beach (less then 10 minutes)
Possible problem for families is that in 2 bedroom villa one of bedrooms is a separate building - so  not suitable for young children.
The breakfast was good both for kids and adults.

The only discomfort - there were no towel rail or any other dryer…
title: Nice family holyday

text: This is the second time we rented out a villa at Artemis with friends. This time it was a 2 br villa with a private pool. Great peaceful location, no street noises, clean and well kept. The pool and the rooms were cleaned daily, the kitchen was well appointed and you could have room service or go into the common areas where there was another pool and bar/eating area. The only thing to improve would be the variety available at breakfast, but then again, gave us a reason to go out and about to sample the nearby cafes. Great stay, nice people!
title: Relaxing stay at Artemis!

text:
I stayed at this hotel recently with a group of friends, and we loved it. We stayed in the double bedroom villa. Here are the highlights:
1. Clean and decorated very nicely. 
2. Quiet.
3. Our private pool was excellent.
4. Complimentary breakfast was not bad.
5. 10-15 minute walk to the beach.
6. Great service/staff.
title: Great time

text:
Wonderful hotel. Very clean and quiet.
The staff are friendly and helpful.
Lovely pool and restaurant.
Great location in Seminyak.
Booked directly with hotel and rate included pick up at airport.
Will definitely stay here again!
title: Perfect

text: ...the hotel rooms need refurbishing. The photos on the website are a fair representation but the hotel rooms are showing their age and are in need of re-painting.The one bed apartments are beautiful (see the all white bathroom photo). The staff are lovely, the location is very quiet yet very central, close to numerous bars and restaurants The beach is close but not particularly picturesque. The dining / pool area is a lovely place to relax and unwind.
title: Beautiful and quiet, good location but...

text:
Wanted to spend a couple days in Seminyak. So I chose this property off of a booking website based upon user reviews and price. It was a slow weekend so I was able to land a 1BD villa so $175/night (taxes included).

Location was just off the main street, but far enough back that I didn't hear the horns or motorbikes at all. Was very surprised when I walked in. Small little hotel with pool and restaurant in the middle. All the rooms are pretty much directly off the pool. Villa was completely private and not open windows to the pool.

Within the villa there were 4 separate areas. The outside courtyard area had a jacuzzi. One entrance led to the living room, dining room, and full kitchen. The other to the bedroom. The bathroom was technically outside (but completely private). A full mosquito net was incorporated into the bed.

Would definitely go back!!!
title: Great little hotel in Seminyak

photos.caption: Jacuzzi in your own private villa courtyard

text:
Really enjoyed staying at the Artemis & would highly recommend.
Got a complimentary transfer from the airport due to staying over 1 week, driver was polite & friendly. Room was spacious and light with 2 daily room upkeeps. Was quiet at first so had the lovely pool and eating area practically to ourselves, but all Villa's have pools so even when it got busy wasn't too crowded.
Staff were polite, friendly and service was prompt. All staff always willing to help in anyway & always smiling and saying hello.
Only a couple of small things weren't great eg lighter in room to light the mosquito coil was empty but was fixed immediately when mentioned. Incense holder was cracked & leaked but didn't say anything, but am sure they would’ve fixed asap if mentioned. The TV was on the small side.
They had an international power adaptor which was great!
Bed was firm but comfortable. Room was spacious.
Restaurant food was Great!
Although the aircon wasn't in the bathroom you could leave the door open and get a bit of the cool air, have come across this before and it's the way with an outside shower area, which is worth it.
Good location to shops/beach and Spa Bali for pampering.
title: Lovely personal oasis

photos.caption: View from my sunlounge with the restaurant behind me

text:
We checked in on 18th Feb to 22nd Feb 13. Once we arrived at the hotel. The receptionist came out greet us, very efficient service, less then few mins got the key and the staff shown us the hotel and room facilities. Every staffs very polite, greeting guest and smiling face, feel very warm welcome.
The restaurant staffs was fun and alert. We really enjoyed our breakfast and drink at the restaurant.
Beautiful room layout and pool, feel like in oasis resort, very tranquil and magnificent place. I can stay in the hotel for whole day. One things, should put a kettle in the room for coffee or tea facilities.
Location is good, out from the busy tourist area, walking distance to Seminyak square- 25mins. enjoyed the local people and foods. 
Take taxi to Kuta town cost appox Rupiah 22k to 30k (USD2 to USD3) only.
I definitely would return to this hotel again..I'm really miss the hotel...:-)
title: Good Location and Good Service Like Oasis

photos.caption: Bath room-very very nice part of open air shower...

text:
After being picked up from the airport by Artemis Villa's, we found the driver had fantastic English and told us where to buy an iPhone simcard, very helpful.
Lovely welcome drink and cold towel. Stayed in hotel room down back of property, really nice and quiet! Beds really hard and a little uncomfortable but bearable.
Breakfast needs to be bigger and you should be able to have what u want instead o going by a continental or American or indo breaky only....
Great staff and always accomodating.
Excellent value for money! Perfect for couples we think!
title: Excellent value for money!

text: We booked this on the back of seeing a reasonable offer on here. It was a stab in the dark. Bagus, the manager was a delight to work with when emailing him and confirming the booking. (not sure if he is still there) We stayed here in 2010. I can't stress how hospitable and friendly all the staff were, including the owner. My husband proposed in Bali, and asked Bagus where the best spot would be, Bagus went out of his way for a whole day to research the best spot, by taking photos and booking it all. He also took photos for us on the day as well, organised a heart shaped cake when we got back to our room. The place is very clean, roomy, refreshing, close to the beach, in a safe spot, 2 minute walk to the main hustle of seminyak for shopping and restaurants. Great stay for families or couples. I can't wait til we go back to Bali and stay here again!
title: What a humble place...Super clean!

text: The villa was beautiful and the pool sensational. We stayed in a two bedroom villa with private pool. It was lovely and the staff were very nice. It is down an alley and it was mostly safe although we did get followed once... this is no reflection on the hotel as this could happen anywhere. There is security so just be careful as you would normally. The staff were very accommodating and although there was an issue with one of the rooms leaking water after a very bad storm... they did their best to fix this and even provided us with an extremely late check out until our flights... that being 7pm!!! They were extremely professional and friendly... I would def recommend this place!!! Breakfasts were nice and simple and they were kind enough to get soy milk for us! Thanks
title: Gorgeous villas and wonderful stay!

text: We booked this place really last minute so I wasn't sure what to expect but it was an amazing find. Its down a tiny little back alley way which we were worried about at first but it was absolutely safe and fine. Its in a great location in Seminyak right near the beach and good shops. We got the deluxe apartment and it was right outside the pool and right near the restaurant. The restaurant overlooks the pool and they have live music some nights. The food was really good, and the service was really friendly and helpful. The rooms were really nice the bed was huge and comfy, we had a little kitchenette which was very useful and the bathroom was big and clean. We stayed three different places and this was our favourite. The value for money is excellent. We will be back next time we come to bali!
title: Absolutely fantastic

text: Free upgrade helped - the apartments are beautiful...  Nice pool... Staff were always friendly and helpful to the extent possible...  The owner Madi (sp?) was always around and a cool dude that cares...  We loved it... Restnt was solid...  Breakfasts were amazing - delivered to room... About a 7-8 minute walk to beach... Would stay there again for sure...
title: No complaints!  Really enjoyed the place.

text:
Rather than going from average to very good, I'd like to see another category such as good. Good is how I would rate this facility.

During a recent trip to Bali I stayed at the Artemis villas and hotel in Seminyak. When we arrived quite late at night, we were upgraded from a garden villa with spa (sans pool) to a villa with a huge and very welcome pool. 

The facility was clean and the front of house staff were exceptionally courteous, helpful and friendly.  They were more than willing to attend to needs of their customers. Kitchen staff however, require much more training in customer service and service overall. 

This facility was ideally situated near most of Seminyak's dining and shopping attractions and is about 600 metres from the beach. What more can one need!
title: A good experience

text: Stayed here in Sept. after a nasty experience at another villa, it was a huge relief to stay somewhere very clean and central. Nice and quiet, lots of relaxing by the pool, staff were helpful and friendly and the food was very fresh, I ate in the restaurant numerous times. I'd be happy to stay here again.
title: Bliss

text: So weird we keep getting phone calls to our room from telemarketers the staff were allowing it??? Really quiet but maybe lack a little atmosphere ?? Furnishings were gorgeous!!!The lane ways to get there a little dangerous for the L plater the Japanese breakfast was the best I've ever had !
title: Clean great food but staff unhelpful

text:
Overall we were pleased with our choice the Artemis. It is an ideal place for couples and groups looking for quality in an area set back from the main strip areas.

We booked here online not really being sure if Seminyak was quite our thing. We were put off Kuta with all the reviews of it being the party area so we hoped Seminyak would be ok.  We really should not have worried, there is something for everyone here, bars, beach, restaurants etc without being in your face.

The hotel is in really good condition, kept clean and tidy by the staff. The pool is nice and quaint and they have made the best of the limited space they had. We only used the restaurant for the breakfast which was nice and offered choice and was freshly prepared to order.  We found the staff polite and attentive.

The rooms are excellent, they are large compared to most mid budget places and are kept very clean and look either new or freshly renovated. Ours had a giant extra extra double sized bed, tv, fridge etc. the bathroom was large with a really good shower and a bath.

Location wise it is set down a back alley off one of the main streets and is 5 mins walk to a good area of the beach. There are lots of places to eat on the main road outside and also various beach bars and mini restaurants on the beach itself serving local and western foods. There are supermarkets etc close also.

This is a good choice if you want a bit of quality and don't want to pay through the nose or suffer the background noise of the beach area.
title: Good choice for a nice hotel in a quiet area but close to everything

text:
We found an excellent rate on Agoda for a one night stay, and were amazed on arrival at the huge difference between what we got here for circa HK1,000 per night compared to the previous 7 nights in other nearby resorts... 

The room was absolutely immense - huge bathroom with freestanding bath and rain shower, separate bedroom with double king size 4 poster and event  small kitchen with self-catering facilities in in the living room. Opened onto a small verandah with outside seating. 

Opened directly onto a beautiful and well maintained pool. Service was smiley and efficient throughout. Two grumbles only: 

1) The american breakfast was pretty poor. Juice was syrupy sugar solution with orange colouring... nothing like juice (though fresh local juices ere I think available). The butter was some kind of artificial axle grease and the bread was supermarket packet style. 

2) We asked for an extra 2 hours only late check out and were told that this would incur a 50% room rate... which was pretty steep considering. 

Overall though it was very good and wouldn't hesitate to book again.
title: Lucky last minute find.

text:
I was planning this holiday about a month ago. Received tips from a local friend, not to stay in Nusa Dua (the area that I love so much) amid road works and heavy traffic. They suggested to stay in Seminyak/Kuta/Canggu area instead. 
After all heavy screening of Villas and hotels in these 3 areas, putting consideration of location, privacy and pricings, we opted to go for Artemis Villa in Seminyak due to their high rating on privacy. 
Indeed, you wouldn't imagine that there's such a secluded and quiet place in the middle of hectic Seminyak with just 10 mins walk to black sand seminyak beach (near Anantara and Chez Gado Gado). Location wise it's good (but not perfect). Minimarts, Spas, restaurants are just a stone throw away. 
Back to reality, the building itself is in a very good shape. We rented the V2 2BR private villa. In minor details, to my standard (and to SGD 400+/night standard) this villa is poorly maintained. Shower drain clogged in every bathroom, even though we asked the management to fixed it for 2 times, and we just accepted the way it was afterwards. Pool was cleaned daily, but not the floors. It was full of bird's poo in one open corner, some of them form clusters of fungus moulds. 
Staffs. Very friendly before and during the 1st few days day of our visit. Communicated with them before arrival, to clarify some things, e.g airport transfer etc. They provide one way airport transfer if you were staying for min of 3 nights. and they provided baby cot for free. However, on 3rd day some of the staffs had turned unfriendly and few showed violence in their way of communicating. From checking on breakfast (some problem with breakfast serving that I would only discuss with the villa management only) responded quite rude and accusing me of cheating, to violent response when pasta carbonara was not served for my children after 40 minutes in their restaurant (mind everyone, we were eating in their restaurant, not room service) while we were the only guest in there. 
However, to be fair I still have to thank the remaining of the friendliest staff. Like Ms Nengah and the reception team that are very nice and helpful, and also Mr. Lukas the friendly security guy.

My suggestion to family vacation planner : stay in Nusa Dua instead. We visited Benoa during our stay, and actually the road works site can be circumvent. For their published rate of USD 350/nite (we got SGD 400/night from Agoda), probably this would be my last stay at this villa.
title: just an 'OK' stay.

text:
Me and and four girlie mates stayed here in a three bedroom villa with a private pool and it was pretty stunning - just the right balance of Balinese and modern. The kitchen had a big fridge and clean crockery. The pool was just the right size, clean and got the sun all day. The rooms all had ensuite and a view/doors out onto the pool. The beds - some four poster - were comfy and had mozi nets and AC. The main lounge area had a large dining table and sofa and a TV with a DVD player. It was fairly warm in there during the day as there was only a fan, no AC. There were areas of the villa which led directly outside to the open air without a door. This may have bothered some people - we were fine with it and didn't have any problem with insects (except a few mozi's - we did have to wear repellent whilst in the lounge at night).

The food was fine, the brekkie pretty good and there was a very nice shared pool to eat by. Also a nice falafel place just round the corner. The staff were all really helpful and friendly, our room was cleaned everyday and our towels changed more than once a day if needed. Once we had checked out on our departure day, they allowed us to use other rooms to have a shower. The double rooms were nice and lined the shared pool, so just a stone's throw away. 

The location, however, could have been better. Although the villas are tucked down an alleyway so you didn't hear any noise, there were a couple of go-go bars just up the main street. We could walk to the beach (less than 10 mins) and there were some nicer beach bars and restaurants down there. The beach wasn't exactly stunning and the street that ran alongside it quite dirty. We found that the other end of town was the nicer part and got a taxi down there (5 mins) or to Kuta (slightly further) for a more lively scene.

With respect to the food in Bali, we really found you get what you pay for - the more expensive restaurants being the better ones. I really like to try the local cuisine when i visit somewhere - so i tried the Balinese set menu at the Seminyak Cafe - mistake - it was disgusting and the bits that should have been warm were stone cold. 

The accommodation was absolutely perfect and good value but you have to be prepared to get a taxi to the nicer bars and restaurants.
title: The perfect chilled girlie holiday!

text:
- got upped to apartment room, huge at 86m2, very high villa ceilings
- lovely huge bathroom with natural lights, easy to ignore next property sounds during day
- breakfast in room at no charge is so romantic, at pool side also nice but busy too
- they light coil to chase away mosquitoes. Beds have great netting
- all requests raised were handled promptly and issues fixed up
- polite staff, need to talk to them with a smile and you get a bigger smile in return
- cleaning staff were great
- has a spa for massages but no fitness centre. No space for it sadly
- pool is beautiful and apartment opens into it
- wifi is better at the pool side restaurant
- nice quiet 2min walk from main road, so very quiet location for Artemis. Taxis can be stopped easily and so cheap
- many minimarts for quick snack buys and cool drinks
- many bars nearby to choose from for late night. Few gay bars too. All nightlife with no drunken brawls 
- nice restaurants nearby, one even open 24hrs, others till late

- best restaurant was Queens tandoori on Jalan Seminyak near Jalan Kunti corner. Best best Indian food worldwide. Try it and you will surely agree with me. Short walk from Artemis too
- best massage try a gem further away at Kerobokan area, on Jalan Merta Agung, only 5-10min drive to UME Spa. Lovely private rooms with showers and soothing music. Just relax and let the masseur do their magic. Better then massages in Thailand

Artemis was a good find and ranks with my top hotels list.
title: Such a pleasant resort-like stay

text:
Best 11 days on our 3 week vacation. Loved everything, the staff was amazing, so helpful and happy, food was not bad, we stayed in the apartment that was huge open, light. outside bathroom with shower and tub. huge bed very comfortable. The pool and outside garden was always clean.
The only think I can think of is that it was alot of shade around the pool.... and Mosqitos... but that is not the hotels fault. But a 5 minute walk to the beach and you got no shade so it was a quick fix
title: Great place to stay at!!

photos.caption: bedroom with a huge comfortable bed

text: Artemis is a beautiful place to stay whilst visiting Seminyak. Excellent value for money and great setting. The house keepers would light the oil burners and incense for when I returned to the room and the welcome gift was sweet. I'd highly recommend staying here.
title: It's in the detail

text:
Its a very quiet, nice and relaxing place to stay. I liked the pool and the restaurant for breakfast in a very nice garden area. 
Just few minutes walk to some nice bars and restaurants and also quite near to the beach.
I had a little villa and so much space...... wow!
The staff was always friendly and nice!
If you want to stay in Seminyak its a very good choise.
title: Great Place to stay

text:
This is a cosy, little place at the end of a winding little lane in Seminyak off the bustling main road to the beach.

We checked in here at the last minute because of a botched reservation elsewhere..and were expecting very little. But it was a nice surprise, and we were upgraded to lovely little villa with a little hall, nice kitchenette, comfortable bedroom, roomy bath and dressing area!! Very clean and quiet. The front desk and housekeeping staff were polite and attentive. HOWEVER the management should retrain or fire the cafe staff who were rude, inattentive and sloppy with service. 
We enjoyed our stay there and dog lovers will love the three happy labradors in three colours that you might meet there.
title: Cosy, little nook

text: great little place to stay.off the main road but it is accessible to all the attractions of seminyak.beach is about 5-7 seven minutes from the hotel and shopping /bars are about the same distance from the hotel.we liked the hotel so much we extended our stay by 1 more night just after reaching the hotel.the apartment was clean and pristine,pool was great and most of time it was free for us alone to enjoy the swim,staff always smiling and breakfast was wholesome.overall great place to stay.we are definitely going back very soon again.
title: serenity in the midst of semniyak

text: My husband and I stayed here while in Bali.  It's a hidden little oasis just off the main street, walking distance to everything that Seminyak has to offer.  The staff were super friendly, as you'd expect in Bali.  Rooms were of a high standard and very clean and well kept.  Highly recommend it.
title: Hidden Gem

text: We stayed at this Hotel for 5 nights and initially booked for 3. We extended after 1 night as the service is super friendly, hotel is compact, but with the individual rooms (and no high rise) it is a lovely place. Great location and very good value for money. Only minor detail is not to use the spa facilities. There are definitely better ones, but all the other facilities are great. Get one of the drivers to show you around Bali, we got Madre, who is a very friendly young lad who's English is good and he showed us some local places, touristy places and was very pleasant and polite.
title: Great place, highly recommended

text: Staff are very friendly , location is very convenient to go to beach, shopping, sightseeing. Very quiet environment , beautiful pool! If I go back to Bali for surd I'll stay at Artemis again!!
title: Definitely Want to come back, beautiful villa!

text:
We stayed in T1 - a two bedroom villa that was overpriced and terrible.  The villa cost double the cost of two hotel rooms because it had a "kitchen" and a "pool". neither the kitchen nor the pool were usable.  The kitchen/lounge area was really as disgrace, without airconditioning and without any service like a TV or ipod station - it lacked anything but a table to sit at and get bitten by mossies.   It had a fridge but so did the hotel rooms.  It had cooking facikities, but how could anyone cook without airconditioning?  The pool was in shade and the pool furniture was very dirty - never been taken care of, the mats for the furniture were covered in  cobwebs.    the very horrible thing about this villa was the lack of privacy, indeed the invasion of privacy.   There is a temple in the grounds of this supposedly private villa and the staff constantly visited the temple, walking past our bathroom, which has no blinds and therefore NO privacy.  It was horrible to be in the bathroom and wonder when staff might walk past!   

When a complaint was made to management, the response was that staff are supposed to check at the desk before using that temple and if guests are in their room, they should use another temple at the front desk.   How silly!   If guests are paying $425 USD per night, they are entitled to privacy 24/7!   Staff should NEVER use that temple while guests are paying for the villa!     If a guest was on the toilet, a staff member would walk past the window, with the guest on full view - to use the shrine at the end of the pool!   None of the bathrooms are airconditioned, just the bedrooms and on a very hot day, the bathroom is an awful place to be. with so many other places in Bali, keep looking and only stay at Artemis if nothing else is close to what you want.
title: Be careful - all rooms not equal and the management is arrogant.

text:
The room we stayed large and very nice.  The vaulted ceilings, huge bathroom, kitchenette, and large bed were very nice.  

The staff (all except for perhaps one front desk man) were a bit indifferent.

The restaurant staff especially seemed reluctant to be working there, with no smiles or forced ones at best.  I imagine this place could have easily earned 5 stars from me, but the service was just a deal breaker.  We checked out after one night.  

They weren't particularly rude or anything at all.  They just seemed dull and lifeless save for one cheerful front desk man.

The location is good and not far from the beach.

Overall if you don't expect lots of huge smiles from all of the staff, and you don't need a view (our bedroom had none, and the living room view is of the pool), you should get a place on the beach.

I won't stay here again, if other preferred places in Bali have vacancies.  

Also the mosquitoes were absolutely taking over this place.  I realize it's a tropical island, but they even find their way into the room.  We kept the provided mosquito coil burning all night and they didn't seem to bother us too much while we slept.  We got bit a lot at the restaurant though.

Anyways, if you are staying an extended amount of time, can deal with mosquitoes, don't mind some apathetic staff, and want a very large and nice room, stay here.

Otherwise.. look around some more.
title: Great place, average service

text: Staff simply couldnt be more accommodating & gave us coils electric mossie killers etc etc but we were still bitten to bits INSIDE our room but not OUTSIDE Lovley light well furnished 1 bed apartment  with a struggling air con unit Apartment kitted out with everything except a kettle which you only got in the nexst grade of villa Ummmm  thought this was a bit petty  Sparlking clean pool & well tended grounds  V Low occuoancy so V quiet & tranquil despite local building noise  Free WIFI  Were given complimentary massage to their Spa ( not sure why?)  which was clean but average. Did NOT get any airport  transfers as booked with Agoda & not direct with them again a bit petty - build it in to your costings  !  Would we stay here again a possible yes if only for the deliciouos Japanese breakfast and charming staff
title: JUST loved the place but JUST hated the Mossies

text:
We visited Bali and stayed at Artemis villa and Hotel ,this is the second time we have stayed here 
We stayed for 6 nights with our sister and brother in law and their 2 teenagers .
 wow what a hidden Gem , just off a popular street in Seminyak , close to everything shops, restuants , night clubs, pubs and beach .
We booked the 0-1 villa as it was 3 bedroom , 3 bathroom ,and pool etc, etc, so we would all have our privacy and own ammenities  and what a pleasant surprise when we arrived .
It was huge , each room had its own shoer, bath , toilet and safe  and all the other extras .
The pool and Jacuzzi is great and looks so nice day and night , 
It is very private with its own walls and lockable gate.
The staff were sooo nice and nothing was a problem for them .
They come and clean the room in morning and the evening , and they always ring the Bell well before entering ,if you are in the Villa they will not enetr unless you let them in .
We were surprised at how quite it was , being to Bali many times we must say , never have we had such a quite place to stay, I actually slept inn.
Artemis also has a geneal pool which is great and a nice small restauant and Bar , 
This is a very place and we will be back , hopefully O1 villa again , if not the other villas and rooms looked good .
title: Hidden Gem

text:
I booked Artemis after trawling the internet for days trying to find that hidden villa that hasn't yet been discovered. My hopes were high given the reviews I had read on here and I was looking forward to 8 nights of relaxation with my mum.

Firstly, the grounds are gorgeous - well manicured gardens and a lovely clean pool. The restaurant bar area was peaceful and inviting and with free wifi what else could you ask for?

Our room was one of the Apartment style rooms with a living/dining area, separate bedroom and outdoor bathroom. Now, I hadn't realised that Bali in Oct/Nov is very hot and humid and as a result the living area and bathroom were stifling hot. The little air conditioner was chugging the whole time and struggled against the heat in the villa. Mum found it hard to sleep and as a result we checked out early to pursue accommodation with more suitable cooling.

The front desk were sincerely apologetic about us not finding the accommodation comfortable and checking out early was not a problem. I must say their customer service was fantastic.

So the bottom line is, if you want villa style accommodation with excellent location, food and service then YES stay here. If you don't mind it hot and a little sticky then you'll love this place.
title: Hot and a little humid

text:
A family with 3 small kids.

We are just back from a short trip to Seminyak where we have spent 4 nights in the 3 bedroom pool villa O1. Ater being welcomed at the airport we arrived at night through this narrow dark street into the small reception where we felt immediately comfortable. One staff accompanied us to the villa and we discovered a faboulous place. The lighting was very well done and made the place magical. The pool was very large and surrounded by a manucured garden. Some "frangipanier" flowers were floating on the pool.
We then came into the main living room which was vast and beautifully lit. The 2 older kids had their own bedroom covered with a mosquito net and all necessarry anti bug equipment provided in the bathroom. The master bedroom was totally on the other side of the building surrounded by the pool.
A/c and fan were working fine. 

We loved the open air bathrooms, the water dispenser in the kitchen and the general quiet ambiance despite being in the center of the busy part of Bali.
Between few errands to the beach to learn some surfing and few trips to other parts of Bali we have spent some great quality family time having lunch in the villa and enjoying the pool at the hottest time of the day.

The staff was lovely.
Breakfast was included and reasonably good and plenty enough. Some real fresh orange juice would have been better.

We would really recommend the place and especially the 3 bed villa to a family or to 3 friends/couples who want to enjoy a bit of luxury for few days. 
The other villas and appartements seemed good as well but certainly not as fascinating as the O1.

Don't hesitate to negotiate as any good deal you can get make will your holidays even better.

We booked through the website of the hotel directly.

Enjoy your stay.
title: We simply loved it

text:
We stayed in one of their hotel rooms for the first 3 day of our stay in Bali and enjoyed it very much. The rooms are nicely decorated and clean. The staff came in twice to replace towels if required and to burn incenses in the evening to keep mosquitoes away (we have not seen any there). What I did not like as much was the terrace as there was only one chair and the view was towards the other villas. 

They have a choice of different types of breakfast and it worth to try the Japanese one - we loved it! The pool area is also really nice and never crowded. We never tried the spa in the facilities but there is a really nice spa close by - Bali Spa! 

They do a free pick up from the airport if you stay at least three days but we had to email them a few times to arrange it.
title: Nice place in Seminyak

text:
My family and I recently stayed for ten days at the Artemis Villa and Hotel in Seminyak Bali.  We have two 12 year old girls and were looking for two bedroom accommodation which we found difficult to find in Bali with most hotels offering only fold out bed options etc if there are more than two persons or we would have to get another room.   
How lucky were we to have stumbled upon the Artemis.  We stayed in the two-bedroom Garden Villa and it was outstanding for all of us.  We each had our own bedroom and bathroom which the girls especially relished making them feel very grown-up but still availing my wife and I with the security of having them close etc but far enough away for us all to have privacy.  Being only six steps from the pool was also great and we all spent a lot of time in there.  The eating area was also right outside our door and was fantastic with a great ambience, good food and the gardens superb.  The spa was also great with the girls loving all of the pampering etc.
Very clean and exceptionally well maintained and with security in the Villa excellent you are within close walking distance to great shopping and eating etc.  Yes the beach is a 5 minute walk but to be honest was not a big priority for us other than to go down to see the sunset.  The villa was like our own personal oasis and when not out and about we spent a lot of time there and it was very relaxing for all of us.  Best thing is that this is not a big place so you feel part of the family and get to know all of the staff and guests and it is a great place for all age groups.
If you are a keen surfer like me, I took my own boards etc, each morning the car can pick you up early and take you up to Canguu or other local breaks for a great morning surf and then be back for breakfast with the family, awesome and tick all the boxes, gotta be happy with that.   
However what really made the Artemis exceptional for us were the staff.  We have holidayed in Bali before and the Balinese generally are renowned for their friendliness etc but the staff at Artemis were a step above what we have previously experienced.   We cannot adequately express how great they were to both Rita and I but more so to our girls.  This really did make our holiday something special and we would all strongly recommend the Artemis to anyone, especially if you have kids and to be honest we are already planning for our return stay next year.  
Yes you can find cheaper accommodation in Bali however in this case the ‘you get what you pay for’ adage is a very apt one.  With great room options, the three bedroom Villa by the way is unbelievable, it is a great place to stay and for the whole family to relax and spend some quality time together.  Like us you will not be disappointed.

Matt, Rita, Savannah & Izabel
title: Best Family Holiday Place

text:
I was traveling with a friend and stayed in Artemis for 12 nights in a standard room. A driver picked us up from the airport (free of charge). Make sure to send them your flight details in order for this to be arranged. Unfortunately, taking you back to the airport is not free of charge and it is much cheaper to go by taxi. The standard room that we stayed in was cute, with the typical Balinese roof, and nice relaxing green colours. The furniture was a bit disfunctional, e.g. the door to the wardrobe was not smoothly sliding and a couple of times it came off the frame and we had to install it back. Also, make sure you bring a sleeping mask to block the light in case you require total darkness in order to sleep. The bathroom is open air, so be prepared for many mosquito attacks. The breakfast was not a buffet but a sit down choice between continental, american, japanese and Indonesian types. Everything we had was fresh and tasty. Make sure to order one of the delicious fresh juices they offer.  
The staff is the hotel's best asset, very friendly and very very helpful. There is always someone at the front desk (24h) and this made me feel safe. Another great thing is that they bring fresh towels every day. The pool is smallish, but seems clean and enviting. Location is great, 5-10 minutes walk from the beach and approx. 20 mins from the clubs at double 6 road, a little further away from Laksamana ("eat street"). The little road leading to the hotel is narrow and not so well lit at night, however, you don't feel any danger.  At least I didn't.  
Overall, Artemis is a nice hotel. Even though it does not offer the luxuries of a big chain hotel, nor the special touch of a boutique hotel, I very much enjoyed my stay there and I felt totally comfortable, relaxed and taken care of. It was exactly what I needed.  
Now, the issue of price. We paid 150 $ per night. I believe that it is slightly overrated, given the abundance of choice for hotels and villas in Seminyak. Nevertheless, I did not regret staying there at all. Artemis was a good choice and I left with very good memories of the place.
title: Very nice

text: We had a wonderful 10 day stay at Artemis in a beautiful and well kept 2 bedroom garden villa (we were upgraded upon arrival) including a fully equipped kitchen. It was our first time to Bali and we enjoyed it thoroughly. Our kitchen we only hardly used because the chef's in the little restaurant on site catered so well to our special dietary requirements (gluten free diet) and the food tasted really good that we did not bother to cook as planned or go elsewhere for dinners. The eye for detail at Artemis is what we feel really makes the difference. Artemis gives your stay a very private relaxed touch and all that Seminyak shopping is only a short stroll away - so is the beach. We would stay there again, for sure. The only thing we find is that there are nicer beaches in Bali other than Seminyak beaches...
title: Wonderful tranquil heaven with attentive staff

text:
We stayed in Pool Villa 1 with our children aged 7 and 5.  We can't wait to stay there again.  The villa we had was gorgeous and spacious.  The whole establishment is set back from the main road and is very quiet. Our kids loved walking out to the main road through the narrow alley (they called it the maze).  Especially at night looking for lizards and bats. There are bars and clubs not far away and we couldn't hear them at all. All of the staff were very friendly and helpful.  Each day our room and pool were cleaned.  
It was the little things we loved at Artemis.  The kitchen had a water cooler so we could refill our bottles.  In the bathrooms they would refill little ceramic bottles with soap, shampoo, and conditioner.  Both of these practices reduces a lot of waste and rubbish of plastic bottles (which there is a lot of at other 5 star places we have satyed). The rooms had mozzie coils and insect spray provided that we used at night (we hardly saw a mozzie though).  Electrical adaptors were also provided. 
It was beautiful having breakfast in the resturant by the main pool. My son called it his special place.  They also do the best fresh juices we had in Bali!  Their menu food was also great and competetive in price and quality to the resturants in the main street.
The only down side to our villa was that you couldn't access the kids room from inside the villa.  This meant that if there was a drama with kids in the middle of the night the only way they could get to our room was by walking along the side of the pool or along the back of the villa that had sharp rocks to walk on. In the evenings there was a slight 'Bali pong' in the main bedroom but if you lit the beautiful oil burner in the room you couldn't notice it.
The location is great.  A  large choice of places to eat at the end of the alley  and walking disatnce to the beach, Bintang supermarket and all those gorgeous Seminyak shops!
We can't wait to go back - even if we did have to sleep with a child each!
title: AN EXCELLENT, QUIET AND RELAXING PLACE

photos.caption: looknig across teh main pool to the resturant

text:
We stayed for seven nights because the 7th night is free when you book for six.  I believe for 100 USD a night, it was worth what you get.  
The breakfast that is included with your room is good; I would recommend the indo noodles, even for brekkie.  

We only ate one meal at the hotel because the service at the bar/restaurant was maybe the least desirable thing about our stay.  They can be slow and the food isn't the best.  However, there are so many other great restaurants in the area, that it's worth getting out, exploring and trying something different.  Me'nu is right down the drive from Artemis and it's very good.  JP's and Queens Tandoor Indian are also within walking distance.

When we arrived, we were given an apartment: huge bed, bigger TV, nice outdoor bathroom.  It was nice, but I think someone else noted that the sitting room doesnt have AC and you dont really need to make your own food when there are so many cheap options so close, therefore you dont need a lot of what the apt. offers.  

The hotel room that we were moved to was smaller, but fine for what we needed.  The AC worked well, everything was clean, safe worked, bed and pillows were not super nice, but good enough.  

The hotel provided fresh towels everyday or more, if you need.  Broken toilet was fixed right away.  Employees were very nice in general.  

Pool and surrounding greens are beautiful and therefore seating at restaurant/bar is nice as well, day or night.  

There is free wi-fi or two computers for internet use available.  

In general, we had a really lovely stay.  Bigger villas at this place would be great for a family or friends staying together, I'm just not sure how the prices compared with other places.  

I'd say try it now while the intro. prices are cheaper!
title: Beautiful place, decent for the price, would recommend it!

text:
Found Artemis Villa while searching online for a place to stay for our 4N holiday at Seminyak. We previously stayed at a really nice villa at Sanur (Aston Legend Villas) and wanted to try something that did not look typically "balinese".

Arrival/Departure - Our flight arrived early so our driver wasn't there. Had to wait for a bit before he turned up so no biggie. Quick ride to the hotel, about 15 minutes. Note: Road leading to/from hotel is horrendously narrow and small. I was amazed at the driver's skill in navigating it! The walk in/out was a bit of a bummer, especially at night when it was dimly lit. We asked for the cost of a ride to the airport and they charged us 100,000rp. We chose to take a (bluebird) cab and the fare cost us 55,000rp (including toll fee and a small tip).

Amenities - Villas/apartments surround the pool so you'd always be near it! Smallish free-form pool but good enough if you're looking for a quick dip. A couple of beach chairs beside the pool but I expect it may not be enough if ALL the rooms are filled up. Free wifi which was great but can only be accessed if you are near the pool/restaurant.

Food - Offered english breakfast (eggs, bacon, sausage, etc), japanese and local (nasi goreng, mee goreng). Nothing spectaculr. Strangely, they seem to add salt to the sunny-side-ups making it almost inedible. The husband (who was feeling brave) ordered the japanese breakfast on our last day and regretted it immensely. Came with 3 tiny bits of omelette (japanaese-style), some beans and very very salty Miso soup.

The room - We originally booked the jacuzzi villa but asked to switch to a smaller room, i.e. the apartment rooms, after one night. Nothing particularly bad about the jacuzzi room except that:

- it was too big for the 2 of us (husband and I).
- the living/dining room area wasn't air-conditioned and it was humid and uncomfortable despite having all the doors open and the fan at full speed. We ended up spending all our time in the airconditioned bedroom!
- the aircon compressor was, strangely, located just outside the bedroom. This means that you hear a constant humming noise that was too loud to ignore. Didn't help that I'm a light sleeper!
- the aircon wasn't strong enough to cool down the room. Even at high and 17 degrees, it was still not particularly cool.
- the in-room safe wasn't working properly (i.e. didn't open even when we keyed in the SAME password) so we felt nervous putting our valuables within. Staff was helpful and reacted quickly though.

The manager on duty was very kind when we brought up our concerns and offered to upgrade us to.....a bigger room, the pool villa! We turned it down because we did not need the space and chose to stay the remaining 3Ns at the apartment. Much better - for us, anyway - because even though the living room area wasn't air conditioned, the aircon from the bedroom would come through to cool the area. Thankfully, there wasn't any aircon compressor noises as well.

Note: There aren't any blackout curtains of any sort in the rooms. Wooden blinds were used so if you are the sort to like sleeping in, you'd probably be woken up by the sunlight streaming in. Also, the rooms are build in such a way that there would be areas where (outside) light would stream in so you never really get 100% darkness.

The usual amenities are provided in-room (hair dryer, toothbrushes, bathrobes, etc). Also provided were insecticide and mosquito coils which were very useful for the bathroom area since it was open-air and hence attracted loads of mozzies!

On arrival, placed on our bed was also a little welcome gift of a mini clay aromatherapy holder inside a pretty rattan box, held together by a necklace with a crescent moon pendant. That was a nice touch and made for a pretty souvenir of the stay.

Location - As mentioned by the various reviewers, the resort is a short 10-minute walk but in the heat, it can be slightly unbearable. When taking a cab, tell the cab driver "Bestest Cafe" (located across the small street). The hotel is new so there are no signs on the main road indicating its location! Shopping, eating areas are a street away and easily reached by cab. Or walk - if you are feeling very brave and don't mind sweating buckets! :)

Staff - Generally helpful and service-oriented but room for improvement. Perhaps more training?

Others - The hotel is not fully completed yet so there are construction workers walking about the site in the day. Also, construction noises can be heard in the day but nothing too dramatic. Could tell that the hotel was keeping noise to a minimum.

The good:
- Friendly staff
- Basic amenities around the hotel vincinity (cafes, supermarket, shops)
- Welcome gift (good additional touch)
- Decent location (but there are other hotels closer to the main "action" at Seminyak)

The bad:
- Long walk in/out of the hotel
- Might be difficult to locate, i.e. no signs on the main road
- In-room furnishings are rough, i.e. doors do not close smoothly, mattresses/pillows not particularly comfortable, etc.

Overall, I would rate the hotel 6.5 out of 10. We wouldn't call it a luxurious resort but it wasn't bad either. It's just that there are LOADS of resorts/hotels in Bali/Seminyak and for the price that we paid, we could probably find a better hotel.
title: Room for improvement

text:
On Arrival 1/5 stars

We were supposed to be greeted at the airport by the driver of the hotel, but when we arrived we were informed, through us contacting Artemis that the driver would be 40 mins. We opted for a taxi. We were greeted with smiles aplenty at the front desk and were shown to our room and given specifics of breakfast time and other info relating to the room.

Room 3/5 Stars

The room is very nice, tin candles with our names were awaiting us on the bed. The bed is huge, occupying much of the room.  The desk is somewhat functional to use your laptop with the free wifi, but the chair provided is woefully inadequate. Way too small and I'm a small guy! With a high vaulted ceiling and a spinning fan the cooling system was adequate, but they need to double the size of the AC unit. The bathroom doesn't have any windows in it, therefore it's always hot and a harbinger for mosquitoes! The shower drainage backs-up almost immediately upon usage. The shower stall doesn't have a proper barrier, so you end up with water all over the floor when you've finished your business. Initially, the water was scalding hot, but that was fixed upon our request. The toilet required continuous fiddling, as it often continuously flushed. 

Ammenities 3/5 Stars

Free Internet was a plus, though it was down our final two days there. They do however offer a library with two desktops at the ready.

Location 4/5 Stars

It's a good 5-10 minute walk from the beach and the hotel do provide you with a  towel. There are plenty of stores along the way if you require a massage, espresso or some water.

Bed 3/5 Stars

As mentioned, the bed is huge with a ledge which requires you to jump over to put your feet on the floor! It was comfortable, but the pillows were a foot thick and hard. We asked for some replacements, but never got it. Perhaps they never understood us!

Breakfast 4/5 Stars

A la carte and very good. Offering a good variety and fresh juice along with plenty of fresh fruit.

Check-Out 5/5 Stars

Big smiles and efficient with a ride to the airport included in the price.

Miscellaneous 4/5 Stars

The pool was smallish but nevertheless very nice. In fact, we spent more time at the pool then at the beach!

Delivering fresh towels every evening was a nice plus.All in all a good place to stay. The place has recently opened so there are some growing pains, along with some construction being done on the grounds. We got a discounted rate.
title: Growing pains, but a nice place to stay

text:
Je dois dire que j'ai bénéficié d'une belle promo.

Bien que connaissant très bien Seminyak, je n'aurais pu me douter qu'une petite perle pareille s'y cachait !

Très calme, à proximité de tout.
Chambre standard superbe.
Personnel top.
Je ne vois rien que je pourrais dire de négatif.
title: Je donne mon avis non comme bon mais comme mien.

owner_response.connection: 広報担当マネージャー
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
仕事で超多忙の日々が続き、バリに行って海でも見てのんびりしようと思いバリ旅行を計画✈️しました。
本当に沢山ある中からホテル選び迷いました。
コスパとシチューション、それと日本人がマネージメントしてると行う事で安心かな？って思い決めました。日本語も通じるスタッフもいらっしゃるという事で。少しは英語も出来るのですが、

でも今になっては本当に正解！ここで良かった😊
時間をかけて選んだ甲斐があって良かったー🤣

なぜならば、着いた3日後になんといきなりの腹痛と高熱でうなされ、頭も回らぬまま寝込んでしまいました。心当たりが無いので慣れない国での不安と絶望感😱

その時にここの日本人の方が大変親切にして下さり色々とアドバイスして頂きました。
そして🏥に行くと入院しなければならないと😱
それで大事に至らずに済みました。
そして無事退院✌️

後になってぞっとしました。
もしも言葉も通じないホテルだったらっと😱
少しの英語しかままならない私。バリも詳しくない私。アドバイスがなければ我慢してこじらせてるかもしれないと、、、

🏥退院後にもアルテミスのスタッフがとても心配してくれててフレンドリーで涙が出ました😭

この場を借りまして、スタッフの皆様、
本当にご親切にアドバイスして頂きまして有難う御座いました。ご心配をおかけしました。
本当に大変心強かったです。
無事帰国は予定日に出来ましたし✈️
スタッフ様のお陰です。本当に、、、感謝です😭

是非また今度バリに行く時は、体調を整え再び其方のホテルを利用させていただきたいと思っております👍
その時は宜しくお願いします😆リベンジするぞーっ👍本当にご親切に有難う御座いました😊
title: 本当にこのホテルを選んでで良かったーっ！！！😭

owner_response.connection: お客様担当マネージャー
owner_response.text: 今回は大変でしたね。次回はぜひバリをもっと満喫してください。スタッフ一同お待ちしております。
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
7年くらい前にネットで見つけ宿泊して以来毎年利用させてもらっています。バリのホテルは劣化が早いホテルが多いが、このホテルは常にメンテナンスを欠かさず、いつ来ても清潔で気持ちよく利用する事ができる。多くのホテルは写真と実物が異なる事が多いが、このホテルは‥ 写真以上の感動を与えてくれる。日本人オーナーということもあり、滞在中何かあっても相談すれば対応してもらえる。朝食メニューも豊富で、日本語メニューもあるため全く困らない。そのほか、ヨガスタジオが併設されており、ヨガ等に無料で参加もできる。スミニャック ビーチ、両替所、レストランなど徒歩圏内でありビンタンスーパーにも歩いて行ける。
とにかくおすすめです！
title: 日本人には安心できる素敵なホテル

text: Wij hebben 1 nacht last minute geboekt in Artemis. Het is een prachtige locatie met zeer vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel. Wij zaten in een “Studio appartement” volgens de boeking, deze kamer was mooi en proper enkel de badkamer kon iets hygiënischer. Daarnaast hebben we ook gebruik gemaakt van het restaurant, een simpele maar goedkope kaart die uiteraard wel lekker was. Ligt op een wandelafstand van de zee, winkels en restaurants. Ideaal dus.
title: Uitstekende locatie

text:
Nous avons réservé vraiment à la dernière minute (à 14h pour s'y rendre à 14h30...).
275 € pour 5 nuits, une chambre standard.
Quelle surprise à notre arrivée..nous avons été surclassés en appartement.
Le logement est grand, fonctionnel. Le lit est immense ! Les oreillers trop petits par contre. 
La salle de bain est top avec douche et baignoire.
La piscine est juste grande comme il faut mais vite à l ombre.
Le seul grand hic réside dans le fait que l appartement se trouve en face du petit resto de l hotel et de la piscine.
Nous avons été réveillés tous les matins à 7h par le personnel qui préparait le petit-déjeuner car ils parlent assez fort et mettent la musique des 7h30.
Ce matin, des gamins jouaient dans la piscine à 7h en hurlant...je pense que tout l hotel a été réveillé ! 
Dernier point, le ménage mériterait d etre revu. La table basse sur laquelle nous prenions notre PDJ n a pas été nettoyée du séjour par exemple.
Personnel gentil mais sans plus.

Par contre l hotel est vraiment bien placé. A 10 minutes à pied de la plage, 3 minutes des commerces et des locations de scoot/voiture.
title: Bon rapport qualité prix

text: J'ai séjourné quelques nuits dans cet hotel proche de la mer, le personnel a été très agréable, serviable et souriant. Plusieurs options au petit déjeuner sont disponibles, seul bémol selon moi a été le café qui s'apparentait plus à un breuvage noir à base de riz plutôt que de grains de café.
title: Central et confortable

text:
Nous voyageons en couple et avons s'éjourné à cet Hôtel 3 jours. L'endroit est très jolie et très bien entretenu. 

Le carrelage qui mène aux chambres et autours de la piscine est de céramique luisante de couleurs jolies mais très glissant en sortant de la piscine ou lorsque pieds ou chaussures mouillés. ( il a plu 2 jours sur trois lors de notre séjour).

Très belle piscine resto bord de la piscine avec déjeûner compris plusieurs options, bon menu pour les repas prix raisonnables

La chambre est de style Balinais belle déco sauf que l'énorme lit trop grand d'ailleur a en plus une plate forme de près de 30cm autours ce qui rend l'accès difficile inutilement, et les oreillers sont minuscules point a corriger. La télé ne fonctionne qu'avec un DVD aucun disponible.

La location est idéale, au fond d'une allée donc tranquille, 10 minutes de marche de la plage, et 2 minutes de plein de restos et boutiques.
title: Calme et près de tout

text:
ホームページを見たところ、「直接予約の特別価格と内容をメールで問い合わせてください」と  書いてあったので  
トランスポートの質問なども合わせて 
ホームページの問い合わせメールフォームから送っても返信なし。 
もう一つ記載の ヤフーメールのアドレスにも送っても返信なし。

検索サイトの問い合わせフォームから英語で問い合わせも送ってみたが、返信なし。
(たとえ中間が入っていようと他の複数のホテルからは ちゃんと返信あり)

何十箇所も泊まったけど 問い合わせ(それも三箇所の宛先に送ってる)
返信しないバリのホテルははじめて。

近年 顧客競争が激化して、ホテル側は様々なサービスを提供したり、SNSで やりとりも欠かさないなか、特にホームページからのゲストのメールの返信は ホテルとして基本。
それを、怠り たぶんホームページも昔のままチェックもしていない様子。

営業努力せず、惰性的に そのままやってればいいかというような印象を受ける。

ゲストは日本人が多いようだから それにつられて予約が入り ランクが 上に来ていたのかしら。  ランキングでチェックしてそのまま予約しなくて良かった。
title: あぐらをかいてるのかしら

owner_response.text: 返信の件大変ご迷惑をおかけして申し訳ございませんでした。言い訳になりますが時期を確認しますとちょうどホームページをリニューアルをしておりまして同時期に他のゲストの方にも多大なご迷惑をおかけしてしまいました。　今後この様なことがないようにいたします。　不愉快な思いをおかけいたしまして申し訳ございませんでした。
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
一人旅にて、3泊利用しました。
立地もとても便利。通りから少し入っているので非常に静かです。
部屋も清潔で、非常に快適です。ﾊﾞｽﾀﾌﾞがあるので非常に良かったです。
朝食も種類が多く、毎日美味しい食事がいただけました。
プールサイドでも非常にリラックスして過ごすことができました。
title: 便利で快適。

text: 路地を入って行ったら真っ白な建物にブルー！！スタッフさんが笑顔で迎えてくれるアットホームなホテル・ヴェラです。比較的ビーチも近く、買い物やレストランにも歩いて行けるのが◎日本人のオーナーという事もあり、リラックスできる雰囲気でお気に入りのホテルです！！
title: 至る所に気遣いが感じられたヴェラ

text:
部屋はキレイだし、広さもある。
ロケーションも良く、なかなか良いホテル。
サービスも整っている。
ただ虫がいるのが難点。
まあ、バリでいくつかホテルの宿泊したが、虫だけはよほどの高級ホテルでないと、避けられないよう。
title: コスパの良いホテル

text:
コスパ最高！手軽にリゾート気分を味わえます。
アパートメントタイプの部屋に泊まりましたが、プールが目の前のお部屋で、暑さを感じたらすぐに入っていました。
スタッフは皆笑顔でしたし、ターンダウンのサービスもあるのでバスタオルも１日２回補充してくれます。
ホテルには至る所に日本語がありますので、英語が苦手な人でも安心。
あと虫はでませんでした。高級ホテルに泊まってても虫は出るところには出るので、もし出てても気にはしませんが…。
立地は海にも比較的近く、ショッピングなどにも便利ですね！
この価格でリゾート気分を味わえてショッピングも楽しむという事でしたら、このホテルは是非オススメしたいです！
title: この価格なら大満足！

text: ホテルタイプのお部屋に3泊しました。レストラン、ショップなどが並ぶ大通りから路地へ入った所にあるので、繁華街にありながらとても静かでリラックス出来ます。お部屋は十分広くバスルームも広くて使いやすかったです。またアロマオイルを焚いてくれているので良い香りが広がってとても心地良かったです。朝食は洋食、インドネシア、和食から選べてとてもおいしかったです。ホテルスタッフもフレンドリーでした。次回もまた利用したいです。
title: ステキなホテル

text:
全てが素敵でした
3ベッドに宿泊しましたが、ヴィラのプールも広く、ジャグジーでビンタンを飲みながらのパーティも出来ました
マッサージも最高
title: 定宿にしています

text: 出门拐一个路口就到了闹市区，是一个闹中取静适合休息的好地方。酒店不是很大，有一个游泳池，我们订的家庭房还自带了一个小泳池，客厅很敞亮，适合大家一起聊天。服务员很友爱，帮我们订spa，跟我们说元旦前的交通不适合出行，太塞车，节省了好多时间！棒棒哒！
title: 闹中取静

text:
미로같은 좁은 길을 따라 안내를 받아 들어간 방은 
색감부터가 참 아늑하니 좋은 첫인상의 방이 였습니다.
2012년 처음 발리를 방문했을때 묵었던 곳인데,
당시에는 생긴지 얼마 되지 않은곳이라고 설명을 들었던 기억이 납니다.
그래서 그런지 몰라도 참 깨끗하고 깔끔했었습니다.
조식은 몇가지 메뉴중에 고르는 식이였는데 그 중에 미고랭이 있어 주문을 했더니 거의 소금 폭탄이였던 기억이 납니다.ㅎㅎㅎ
수영장 풀은 들어가기 좋은 미적지근한 온도로 설정되어 있었고,
매일같이 정원사 직원분들께서 열심히 주변 조경을 하시는 모습이 인상적이였습니다.
title: 아늑하고 편안했던 기억

text: 11月に友達と利用しました。ビーチまでのアクセスは良いです。フロントも親切で、空港までの有料ですが送迎もあります。しかし、残念ながら、シャワーを浴びてた時に虫が出てしまいました。朝食もインドネシア料理、西洋料理から選べます
title: アクセスは良い

text:
Ein traumhafter Ort. Perfekt nicht allzu teuer und doch Luxus. 
Wir waren im M4 und wir wollten nicht mehr gehen. Sehr gut für Familien geeignet. Es ist eine eigene Küche dabei. Es war sehr sauber und alles da was wir benötigt haben.
title: Super mega schön

text:
Nous avons séjourné 3 nuits ici, les chambres sont immenses et parfaites. Le petit dej est très bien. Le personnel est très agréable. 
Le centre ville de Semyniak n'est pas loin tout comme la plage qui est à 300m à pied.
title: Très bien

text:
Onze villa was super mooi en groot in het drukke Seminyak. De tuin en het zwembad zijn heel mooi onderhouden in Balinese stijl. Je kunt lekker ontbijten aan het zwembad en het wordt op maat bereid dus geen buffet (groot pluspunt). 
Een minpunt is dat de badkamers aan vervanging toe zijn. De kitranden zijn soms zwart en de afwerking is behoorlijk verouderd. Dit zie je niet terug in de slaapkamer, deze is mooi en ruim. Dessalniettemin is de prijs-kwaliteit verhouding goed, ook hier is de bediening super vriendelijk en behulpzaam.
title: Mooie binnentuin en zwembad

text:
In Seminiak ma un pó all'interno dalle vie trafficate puó essere il giusto compromesso. La nostra villa era molto carina, la piscina,  pur non avendola usata, pure..
Il giusto compromesso per stare vicino al mare e anche ai negozi o locali. Alcuni raggiungibili a piedi altri in taxi( molto cheap) da trattare sempre!!!
title: Accogliente e carino

text:
細い路地に入って行くのですが、毎日ホテルに戻るとスタッフの方々が温かく迎えてくれるのが本当に良かった。
朝食も日本語メニューがあり、そこから選べるのですが、種類も多く朝から大満足です。
お風呂だけが、半分外って感じなので、隣の建物からもしも見えてたら嫌だなと思ってしまいました。
それ以外は最高です。
またバリ島に行く事があったら泊まりたいと思います。
title: アットホームでよかった。

text:
Nous avons séjourné pour nos 3 derniers jours sur bali.
L'hôtel est propre,la piscine très propre,le personnel très agréable,le ptit dej très bon.
Nous avons mangés une fois dans l'hôtel c'était très bon, mais pas assez pour nos estomacs :)))
Le rapport qualité/prix au top.
Il est très bien placé.
Le personnel  vient le soir vous mettre des produits pour moustiques et vous fermez les rideaux.
On a cette impressions d'être vip:)
Connection wifi:moyenne
Nous vous recommandons cet hôtel les yeux fermés.
title: Super!!!

text:
異なるビラタイプに２泊ずつの計４泊させてもらいました。メイン通りから路地に入る事もあり、喧騒がなく静かに1日中過ごせます。日本語はスタッフで話せる方もいるし、マネジメントを日本人がされていますので、英語が苦手な方も快適に過ごせます。
スタッフの教育もしっかりされており、おもてなしが抜群に良いこと、並びにセキュリティーについては完璧で安心できます。フロントにはアピマガジンの日本語版もフリーで置いていますので、観光もしやすいです。また朝食メニューは日本語メニューもあり、また日本食の味も美味しいです。各部屋ともに個性違い丁度品のセンスも抜群に良いです。次回はマネージャーの紹介もあり、おとなりの長期滞在用のアパートメントに１ヶ月程滞在してみたいと思います。
title: 日本人におすすめ出来る最高のビラホテルです。

photos.caption: 屋外レストランからプールへの眺め

text: Das Hotel ist einfach spitze! Es liegt mitten in Seminyak. Durch die Lage aber trotzdem ruhig! Es sind 10 min zum Strand und 5 min zu den Gay-Bars. Perfekt. Die Zimmer sind großzügig und ansprechend ausgestattet. Das Personal ist freundlich, super zuvorkommend. Das Frühstück ist ein Traum. Der Pool ist groß genug, Liegen immer verfügbar. Das WLAN funktioniert gut, allerdings in den hinteren Bungalows sehr eingeschränkt. Ich werde wiederkommen.
title: Super Hotel mitten in Seminyak

text: J'ai séjourné en novembre à Artemis Villa avec ma fille dans une chambre standard tout à fait correcte et confortable, même si la salle de bains aurait besoin d'un rafraichissement. La nourriture servie au restaurant est très bonne mais un peu plus chère que dans les restaurants alentours. Le séjour a été très agréable, le chauffeur de l'hôtel est venu nous chercher à l'aéroport gratuitement et nous avons bénéficié d'un massage gratuit pour chacune car nous restions 10 nuits. Nous avons apprécié la proximité des restaurants et magasins alentours, ainsi que la plage facilement accessible à pied. J'y retournerai sans hésitation.
title: SEJOUR ARTEMIS VILLA bon rapport qualité/prix

text: メインストリートからは離れた場所にあるため、騒音も無く静かにゆっくり過ごせる。部屋は清潔、ベッドは広くて満足。但し、奥の方の部屋だったせいかWifiの接続が悪かった。あとは4日の滞在のうち2日(2晩)はシャワー/バスのお湯が出ず、バスタブに入ることができなかった。食事はバリエーションを増やしてくれるとうれしい。
title: 静かでゆっくりできる

text:
El Hotel tiene encanto, es lo suficientemente pequeño con todos los servicios y esta perfectamente situado cerca de la playa y de la zona de restaurantes, se accede por un callejón poco iluminado, estrecho pero tranquilo, eso hace que no se oiga ningún ruido por la noche.
Los empleado son muy amables, en general como en todo Bali. El desayuno es bueno se sirve en la piscina pero no es bufet, hay una carta donde se puede elegir. 
Hay distintos tipos de habitaciones, la nuestra un apartamento grande y limpio que daba a la piscina. La piscina es ideal para darte un chapuzón.
Por la noche en Seminyak hay muchos mosquitos, los empleados te preparan la habitación todas las noches para que no te deboren.
Mejoraria de la habitación el mantenimiento del baño, es bonito y grande, pero por la cal del agua estaba perdiendo "brillo" si se descuida en poco tiempo perderá explendor.
La cama balinesa, enorme y con dosel, muy romántica.
Volvería y lo recomendaría.
title: Perfecto respecto a ubicación y empleados

text:
アパートメントタイプに宿泊しました。
お部屋の中もとても綺麗で
ベットが大きかったです！！
シャワーにシャンプーなど置ける
場所があったり細かい配慮が
多かったです。
日本人オーナーと聞き納得でした。
プールも個人まりしてましたが
のんびり出来てよかったです。
１本路地を入るせいか夜も静かでした。また泊まりたいです。
title: 細かい配慮

text:
L'hôtel est tout proche de l'une des rues principales mais au calme car au bout d'une ruelle.
Belle piscine, petits bungalows agréables.
Bon petit-déjeuner, très copieux.
Possibilité d'emprunter des livres et magazines.
title: Au calme

text:
nous avons été séduits par la proximité de la ville et de la plage mais tout en étant au calme. 
le coin piscine est zen et l ambiance est digne d un petit havre de paix.

mentions particulières : 
- nous avons eu une bonne promo sur internet donc le rapport qualité prix était la cerise sur le gâteau.  
- très peu de monde quand nous y étions
- personnel sympathique
- petit dej copieux

les moins : peut être la literie un peu ancienne
title: proche de tout sans ses contraintes

text:
ホテルのHPを見ると詳しくお部屋の詳細が出ています。
お薦めはプール前のヴィラかアパートタイプ。
お部屋の前に南国植物が垂れ下がるミニテラスで寝そべる椅子があります。
目の前はプール。
近すぎて良い意味でプライベートプールの感覚でした。
予約は日本人対応OKなのでどこの部屋が良いと詳しく質問することができます。
無料の空港お迎えも優しい笑顔のスタッフで安心しました。
食事も種類が選べて美味しく大変満足です！
title: プール前のお部屋がおすすめ

text: Wij hebben echt genoten van deze accommodatie. Achter de drukke straten is dit een oase van rust. De appartementen waren erg ruim en goed ingericht. Het personeel is erg vriendelijk, behulpzaam en je kan met ze lachen! Zeker een aanrader !!
title: Heerlijk!

text:
夫婦と未就学児二人でStudio Apartmentタイプに2泊しました。

朝食で和食を選んでみましたが、ご飯は明らかに冷やご飯を温め直したもの、
卵焼き、揚げ出し豆腐、市販の漬物等でホッとする味ではなく、大失敗でした。
翌日、洋食にしてみましたがパンが美味しくありませんでした。
料理人のレベルを上げる等、改善が必要だと感じました。
朝食に重きを置く私には残念でした。

部屋は隣、対面の部屋との間隔が狭く、あまりプライベート感は感じられませんでした。
静かにのんびりしたいのであればあまりおすすめできません。
カテゴリーが上の部屋だと解消されるかもしれません。

スミニャックで手頃な料金でヴィラ泊まりたい！というのならいいと思います。
部屋のインテリアや雰囲気はシンプルでよくまとまっており、いいですよ。
title: レストランがイマイチでした

text:
ビーチにもショッピングにも便利な場所にあり、
とてもお手ごろだったので、帰国前日に1泊しました。

スタッフの方々は、とても親切ですすんで手助けをしてくださいます。

お部屋も広いし、朝食も美味しい。

しかし、布団にダニがいるようで、
痒くて眠れませんでした。

そして、お風呂場の天井が開放されているのか、
ものすごい蚊が入ってきます。
べーぷなども用意してくださっていますが、
やはり値段なりの設備でした。
title: 惜しい！布団にダニがいなければ。。

text: 朝ごはんがおいしい！プールもきれい、部屋もきれいで落ち着くインテリア、１週間滞在しましたがまた次回もここに泊まりたいと思う素敵なヴィラでした。
title: また行きたい！

text:
Nous avons passé 4 nuits dans cet hôtel à la fin de notre séjour à Bali. Tout était parfait : La chambre, le petit déjeuner copieux,  la situation (au calme, proche de tout - plage, restaurants,magasins... )et un service impeccable. 
Le personnel est très gentil et prévenant. 
Nous avons eu besoin d'un chauffeur à 2 reprises, l'hôtel nous a proposé les services de Kumo - Nous vous le recommandons ! Conduite souple et tranquille, sérieux, et un vrai sens de l'humour.
Bref, nous ne pouvons que  recommander.
title: Séjour au calme au coeur de la ville

text:
Nous avons loué pour trois jours (en promo parce que sinon c'est cher !) un appartement de 86 m² à Artemis Villa. L'emplacement est idéal ; en retrait (et donc au calme) de l’agitation du cœur de Seminyak. Situés à 5 minutes à pied de la plage ou du centre ville, les appartements-villa sont magnifiques et luxueux : salon, cuisine équipée, salle de bain à la balinaise (le lit mesure 2m x 2m40 !) l'accueil et le personnel sont très sympa et compétents. La piscine et les jardins sont très agréables.Bref un sans faute.
Seul petit bémol, il faut choisir une chambre assez proche du restaurant pour bénéficier du WIFI dans l'appartement. Mais bon...
title: Exceptionnel

text: Nous avions réservé 5 nuits une chambre standard en petit déjeuner avec un lit double (très très grand) et un lit supplémentaire pour ma fille de 5 ans (l'hôtel avait eu la gentillesse de me prévenir qu'il n'y aurait plus bcp d'espace dans la chambre mais ça l'a fait quand même). L'hôtel est fidèle aux photos du site internet. <3 <3 <3 Il est situé à 3 min de la mer en scooter (location sur place pour 3€/jr) et du centre avec boutiques, restos, change et salon de massage. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés. Je remercie l'équipe qui c'est préoccupée de l'état de santé de ma fille qui a été malade en début de séjour, ils ont été adorables. Le petit déjeuner est très complet il y en a pour tous les goûts (salé ou sucré). Et ne pas hésiter à choisir le chauffeur de l'hôtel pour certaine visite comme Tanah Lot, Plage de Padang Padang, et finir avec un spectacle de danse à  Pura Luhur. Alors Foncez et Bonnes vacances !!!
title: Superbe Hôtel et Accueil +++

text: Вилла находится на одной из самых оживленных улиц Семиньяка. Отличные бассейн. Его регулярно чистят. Завтрак по меню. Очень вкусные азиатские наборы на завтрак. По вечерам иногда живая музыка в ресторане. До моря метров 500. Пляж Семинька не очень хороший (много мелкого мусора).
title: Отличная вилла

text:
立地はスミニャックにありどこに行くにも便利です。スタッフがみぃ～んな優しく笑顔がいい！！部屋はいろんなタイプがあり、アパートメントタイプと２ベッドルームヴィラを利用しました。白を基調とした部屋で明るくバスルームが最高気に入りました。朝食時間前に出発（ゴルフ）なので朝食がとれないとき、わざわざお弁当にしてくれたのには感激！！
大型ホテルにはない心遣いがうれしかった。。。
title: 部屋がかわいい

text: Очень приятное место,обслуживание на высоте. Смена полотенец 2 раза в день,есть пляжные полотенца,халаты,тапочки. У нас была вилла с 2 спальнями и бассейном. Хотя,на мой взгляд, могло бы быть и подешевле. До пляжа 10 мин пешком. Идти нужно мимо надоедливых продавцов и беспардонных таксистов, выкрикивающих русские слова. На пляже лучше пройти налево метров 100. Там лежаки по 50,а не по 100,как в самом начале. Урок серфинга и доска на несколько часов стоит там де 200 рупий. Недалеко хорощий бар,с живой музыкой и прекрасной кухней( lucky day).  Но, если хочется движухи и веселья-лучше остановиться ближе к Куте.
title: Уютная тишина

text: Nous avions réservé un studio 2 places avec lit supplémentaire. Nous avons recu un très bon accueil dans cet hotel, tout était prêt à notre arrivée vers 22h. La chambre est très spacieuse, propre, lit gigantesque, baldaquin et moustiquaire. Il y a une grande pièce à vivre avec coin cuisine. La salle de bain est incroyable, très grande, en partie ouverte sur l'extérieur par le toit, et très chaude. Le lit supplémentaire est un petit lit plutôt pour un enfant/ado que pour un adulte. La piscine est des plus agréable, avec un bar/restaurant qui propose de délicieux breakfast (continental, américain, japonais). Une restauration est aussi possible, meme si je vous invite à découvrir les restaurants de ville. Notre chambre au rez chaussée disposait d'une petite terrasse avec chaises et table qui permet de se détendre, boire un verre, lire à l'extérieur. La plage est à environ 10 min à pied ! Je recommande vivement l'hotel Artemis.
title: Très bon hotel

photos.caption: la salle de bain ouverte sur l'exterieur

text:
こじんまりしたオシャレな雰囲気もありつつ、程良い解放感のある素敵なところです。
プールサイドでのんびりも出来ます🎶

◆お部屋◆
泊まったヴィラタイプのお部屋は、ロングステイするのには持ってこいの素敵なお部屋です。
部屋の一つひとつが広く、冷蔵庫も小さすぎず、キッチンもあり、インドネシアの伝統的なおうちに住んでいるかのような気分になれます。

シャワーと洗面所が半分外にあるかんじなんですが、それもまた良かったです(^^)
天井の落ち葉？と、床の砂が気になりましたが、こんなもんだと思えば慣れました。

◆ご飯◆
朝ごはんが良かったです！
日本人のオーナーさんということで、和食がありました！
これは嬉しかったです(^^)しかも、すごく美味しかったです。
その他にも洋食、ローカル料理もあり、このバリエーションが嬉しかったです。

◆スタッフ◆
どのスタッフさんも感じが良かったです。
笑顔で挨拶してくれます。

◆立地◆
立地も良かったと思います。
少し歩けば、レストランやスーパーなどもあり便利だと感じました。
ビーチも少し遠いですが歩いていけない距離じゃないです。
夜のビーチは雰囲気があってオススメです。波の音を聴きながらお酒を飲んで贅沢な気分が味わえました。
また、レンタルサイクルやレンタルバイク屋さんも近くにありますし、フロントに言えばここでもレンタル出来ます。

とにかく、日本人にはオススメしたいです。
title: 落ち着くヴィラ

text:
2ベッドルームタイプのヴィラに宿泊。T1。
リヴィングは広く、天井が高く、ベッドルーム(ダブルベッド)も快適。全てが白で統一されていて、清潔感を感じる。部屋にはプールも付いていて、窓から見えるプールの景色が良い。
リビングにエアコンがないことと(ファンはある)、トイレ＆バスルームが一部吹き抜けになっているので土砂降りの日は床が濡れてしまうのが、マイナス点。
共用のレストラン、プールも雰囲気が良く、私は和朝食を頼んだが、2日目も同じメニューだったときは、ちょっとガックリだった。アメリカン、インドネシアの朝食も選べるが、それらを選んでいた家族は美味しそうだった。
スパを利用したが、しっかりしていて満足。ただし、ホテルの周囲にかなりスパがあり値段は安いので、複数回スパをされる場合は外のスパも試すことをお勧めします。
食事も周囲にレストランがあり、問題なし。
スミニャックの大通りまで5~10歩くが、でこぼこ道でベビーカーを押して歩く私にはちょっと不便に感じた。しかし、スミニャックの大通りでの買い物はとても楽しかった。
全体としてこじんまりとして可愛らしいヴィラでかなり満足しましたが、正月価格で非常に高く、長期間泊まれなかったのが残念。
title: 可愛らしいヴィラ

text:
初めてのバリ、初めての海外ひとり旅。そのうえ、英語はまったくと言っていいほどできません。いろいろ不安も抱えながら、空港からタクシーでチェックイン。フロントマン、ベルボーイ、レストランの女性スタッフ、すべての方々の笑顔と挨拶に癒されました。
スタッフのみなさんは、正直、日本語はほぼ話せません。それでも、わたしの片言の英語から、なんとか内容を理解しようとしてくださり、そしてさらに、なんとかその要望に応えようと頑張ってくださる姿にとても感動しました。拙い英単語と身振り手振りで「このスパに行きたい」と伝えると予約電話をかけてくださり、帰ってきてからも笑顔で「大丈夫でしたか？」と聞いてくださいました。
アルテミスに2泊した後、ヌサドゥアの高級ヴィラ（宿泊費６倍以上）に泊まりました。そこは確かに充実＆リュクスな空間で、日本人スタッフもいましたが、「もう一度泊まりたい」「もう一度あのスタッフに会いたい」と思うホテルはアルテミスです。自分自身、「言葉が通じること」がコミュニケーションの一番であると思っていたので、このような気持ちになったことにとても驚きました。それくらい、アルテミスのスタッフの優しさ、温かさに心を奪われたということです。
最後に注意点をふたつほど。１：ホテルHPの地図ではタクシードライバーに伝わりませんでした（ホテルに電話をかけていました）。２：部屋に甘いジュースを置いて寝たら、朝、アリが集まり部屋に行列を作っていました（昼間の間に掃除されて、いなくなっていましたが）。
title: スタッフの温かさに感動

text:
3ベッドルームのO1の部屋に3泊泊まりました。

友人と6名で泊まったのですが、全室ダブルベッドだったので、一部でもハリウッドツインとか
だったらよかったのにと思いました。
リビングは吹き抜けで解放感があり、とても広かったのですが、日本人の性なのか、みんなで
テレビの前のソファのところに集まって過ごしていました。

全室にバスルームがついているので、ほかの人とかち合うこともなく、便利でした。
特に主寝室は部屋だけでなくバスルームやトイレも広かったです。

プライベートプールも程よい大きさで、贅沢な気持ちになりました。

部屋の中（といっても、半屋外のところも多いのですが）には蚊がかなり多く、蚊取り線香はどの部屋
にも常備されているので、炊いていましたが、幸いなことに刺されることはほとんどありませんでした。

日本人がオーナーのホテルだからでしょうか、宿泊客はほとんど日本人でした。
朝食は和食・コンチネンタル・アメリカン・インドネシアンから選ぶことができ、前日の22時半までに
オーダーしておけば、部屋にセットもしてもらえます。（レストランでも食べられます）
和食がそれほど美味しくないという口コミを読んでいてたのですが、旅行終盤で和食が恋しくなって
いた私にはとてもおいしく感じました。3泊中、2回和食を食べてしまいました。

15分のフリーのマッサージチケットがあり、これは宿泊人数分もらえるのですが、
一人で何枚使っても良いし、有料のマッサージに時間延長として使っても良いようです。
マッサージルームはレセプションの真横にあり、2名まで一緒に施術をうけられます。
マッサージの腕はまずまずで、値段もあまり高くはないですが、ホテルの近くの通りには
たくさんの街スパがあるので、そちらのほうが値段は格段に安いです。
ちなみに、ホテルは通りから小道に入って少し入り組んだ所にあります。
タクシーの運転手はほとんど知らないので、ビジネスカードは必ずもらってから出かけたほうが
良いです。

ホテル近くには、ゲイの人の集まるクラブが4、5軒連なっており、夜は道に人があふれるぐらい
盛り上がっています。
しかし、ホテルは大通りに面していないからか、とても静かです。
title: 広くて、綺麗でコスパが良い

photos.caption: パブリックプールとレストラン

text: in de gekte van Seminyak (zuid Bali) is dit hotel een verademing. Het wordt gerund door een Balinees Japans stel. Het hotel is knus, schoon, steilvol en gezellig. Er zijn een aantal kamers en appartementen. Allen zeer smaakvol ingericht. De tuin is prachtig aangelegd rond een mooi schoon zwembad. De badkamer van ons appartement lag deels in de openlucht. erg mooi. 2x per dag worden de handdoeken verschoond en een vers bakje wierrook in de badkamer gezet. Heerkijke bedden! En naast het Indische, continentale of Europese breakfast kan ook Japans ontbeten worden. 10 minuten lopen van zee en naast de winkelstraatjes van Seminyak.
title: Rustig en mooi in druk Seminyak

text: バリに行ったらまたぜひここに泊まりたいと言えるほど大満足。こじんまりとしてますが、きれいなプールとプールサイドにはレストランがあり朝食もそこで食べれます。料理もリーズナブルで美味しい！日本人のオーナーということで日本人好きな感じにしあがってます。場所もスミニャックの中心地。近くにはマッサージができるとこもレストランもあり、海までは徒歩10分ほど。かなりおすすめです！！
title: バリのおしゃれこじんまりリゾート

text:
L'hôtel est bien situé entre la plage et le centre, au calme pour Seminyak. Le personnel est charmant et attentionné : nous sommes bien à Bali. La chambre est vaste... surtout le lit : super king size ! Piscine agréable, petit dejeuner très correct.
Petit chemin sombre le soir pour rentrer après le diner.
La seule réserve : Seminyak qui est completement surfait; mais bien placé pour aller à Tanah lot et finir un séjour a Bali car proche de l'aéroport. Le personnel nous a mis gracieusement à disposition l'espace remise en forme pour prendre une douche. le wifi est un peu faible mais des PC sont disponibles gratuitement.
title: Petit hotel sympathique

text:
Un hôtel magnifique, un cadre de rêve, des chambres/villas de haut standing, pour un prix très raisonnable. Le seul petit bémol se trouve au niveau du restaurant de l'hôtel, qui est plutôt un snack, la nourriture local est très bonne, mais certains plats sont des surgelés de supermarché, et certains plats sont un peu cher par rapport à ce que l'on trouve en dehors de l'hôtel.
Le reste est néanmoins totalement positif, car l'hôtel se situe pile entre la plage et une rue commerçante remplie de boutiques avec des restaurants tout autour ! Très bonne ambiance, le personnel est adorable, disponible et vraiment chaleureux. La grande villa est magnifique, les chambres très spacieuses et la piscine vraiment agréable (seul bémol pour la température du jacuzzi un peu fraiche, mais avec la température extérieure, c'est largement supportable ^^), la master room est à proprement dire hallucinante, et les deux autres chambres sont très correctes. 
Un bilan très positif, un hôtel où il faut à tout prix séjourner !
title: Superbe hôtel, superbes séjours !

text:
Lieu et situation au calme tout en restant près du centre ville et de la plage !
Accueil, chambre, séjour, personnel SUPER 
Lit très spacieux - on nous a mis un lit parapluie à disposition sans frais supplémentaire
massage de 15 minutes offerts
je recommande vivement cet hotel
title: N'hesitez pas à réserver

text: Lieu, service, accueil, tout était parfait lors de notre séjour plage a proximité, piscine spacieuse. Nous avons louer a plusieurs une des villas à disposition avec piscine privé. Nous recommandons vivement
title: Superbe

text:
2月に主人と仕事のためバリに行った時3泊しました。
場所はショップやレストランの多い道から一本入ったちょっとわかりにくい所にあるのですが、むしろ静かで良かった。インテリアは白と緑を基調にしたサッパリ バリ風、天井も高く、部屋の大きさも大きからず小さからず。ただ、隣接してるホテルからバスルームが見えるんじゃないかと気になった。プールサイドの感じは良く、そこで朝食が食べられるのですが、確か洋風、日本食、インドネシアンと選べられ、洋風朝食はシンプルだけど美味しく量もちょうどいい。日本の朝食はいまいち。スパは今回試す時間がありませんでしたが次回は是非と思ってます。
title: リーズナブル値段でロケーション良し

text:
正月に２ベッドルーム　プライベートプールヴィラに泊まりましたがヴィラの敷地内で殆ど他の宿泊客と会いませんでした。（満室のようでしたがプライベート感はキープされているようで静かでした）
天井が高くリビングもベッドルーム×２もバスルーム×２も広々としていてインテリアもとても素敵でした。清掃も行き届き夕方にもターンダウン＆フルーツのサービスがありました。
朝食も部屋で取ることができ色々選べます。フレッシュジュースやフルーツなどおいしかったが子供が食べていた和食はいまいちのようでした。
プールは広く子供も主人も朝から夜中まで自由に入り　日本から持参したボールなどの遊具で気兼ねなく騒げて大満足でした。
ヴィラのスパはとても癒され気持ち良く丁寧でした。今回数か所でスパマッサージをしましたが一番丁寧で上手でした。
又次回も是非アルテミスに泊まりたいと思いました。
title: ずっと居たくなる様なヴィラ

text:
エントランスには白い花が咲いていたり、ロビーにもお花が飾られていたり、とてもかわいらしい雰囲気です。規模は小さいですが、とてもきれいです。部屋はグリーンを基調としており清潔でした。強烈な蚊取り線香が室内とバスルームにすでにたかれていました。過敏な方は事前に伝えておいた方がいいかもしれません。わたしはチェックイン時に気がついたので、外に持っていってもらいました。
スミニャックの中心から若干歩きますがとくに怖くはありません。
出発の日、朝食の時間より早くでないといけなかったところ、小さいボックスにフルーツをつめてくれました。サービスもよいです。
title: かわいらしいヴィラです

text:
高級感はないが、こじんまりしていてかわいいプチホテル。
プール付きヴィラ（TypeV2）に4人で泊まった。2ベッドルーム（1KING+TWIN）+2バスルーム+ダイニングキッチン+プライベートプール
清掃は行き届いていて、清潔感があり快適に過ごせる。庭もかわいい。
オーナーが日本人なので、予約問い合わせなどは日本語で出来た。スタッフは英語のみ。

プライベートプール＋キッチン付きヴィラも他と比べると安く、手ごろにヴィラリゾートを満喫したい人にはオススメ。
朝食はヴィラに運んでもくれるが、プールサードのレストランが素敵。
リビングにエアコンがないが、8月でもさほど暑くなく、困らなかった。（ベッドルームにはエアコン完備）
蚊が多いので、日本から虫除けスプレーを持って行くといい。
併設されているスパは地元情報誌にも載っている店で割と有名らしい。
title: 手ごろな値段でヴィラに泊まりたいなら◎

text:
Hôtel dans une petite rue en retrait au calme tout en restant très proche du centre (animé) de Seminyak. Plage à 5 min à pieds.
Les chambres sont grandes, très bien tenues avec beaucoup de charme. Lit immense (king size), grande salle de bain. Petits-déj très bons, le personnel est charmant et la piscine très sympa. Une très bonne adresse à Seminyak, même s'il faut y mettre le prix.
title: Très satisfait

text:
Je fais plusieurs endroits et hôtels dans Bali ( en ce moment même ) pendant 3 semaines et celui-ci à Seminyak est ce que j'ai vu de mieux. 

Personnel super sympa et à l'écoute et le cadre est magnifique ( piscine dans la cours ). Les chambres sont propres, cosy et mignonnes.

Super Petits déjà au choix ( continental, indonesien etc. )

Ne pas hésiter si vous allez à Seminyak !
title: Ravie de l'hôtel

text: grundsätzlich handelt es sich beim artemis um ein nettes ruhiges hotel mitten in seminyak - strand und geschäfte sind zu fuß gut erreichbar, das personal ist nett und sehr bemüht, die gesamte anlage ist harmonisch und nett gestaltet, der pool liegt ruhig und bietet angenehme entspannung. die zimmer können allerdings sehr hellhörig sein! die ganze anlage liegt hinter mauern, es gibt also keine freie sicht irgendwohin! das sollte man wissen! auch in den villen gibt es keine sicht. mauern vor allen fenstern! in den zimmern stehen computerbildschirme als fernsehersatz. man braucht eine brille um etwas zu sehen. das frühstück ist nicht überwältigend, auch wirkt das personal hier etwas desinteressiert. die bäder sind offen, das personal bemüht sich um moskitoschutz in form von spiralen.
title: richtige zimmerwahl treffen!

text: Acabo de volver de Bali y en concreto de quedarme en este hotel. El emplazamiento inmejorable y el hotel espectacular. Las fotos no hacen justicia. La habitacion era enorme, el servicio super amable. Pensabamos que estaría bien, pero al llegar superó nuestras espectativas!!
title: Las fotos no hacen justicia

text:
agodaで７０００円位で予約していったのであまり期待していませんでしたが、とてもよかったです。こじんまりとしているヴィラで、メイン通りからは１本入ったところにあります。１ＢＤタイプで白を基調とした部屋は、明るくてとても気持ちよかった。朝食付きですが、もう少しボリュームがあればよかった。スパも併設していて、とてもリーズナブルでしたが、マッサージ自体はごく普通でした。
ドライバーは場所を知らないことが多いので、初日は、地図をプリントしていき運転手さんに渡すことをお勧めします。スミニャックに泊まる際はまたお世話になると思います。
title: コストパフォーマンス高い

text:
新しいので、水周りのきれいで使いやすいです。
内装もとても可愛らしく、女性受けするタイプ尾ホテルです。
ビーチには６００メートルくらいだそうです。
title: 可愛らしいホテルです

text:
ビーチエリアのメインストリートを少し奥へと進むと、アルテミスヴィラがあります。
こんなに細い道にホテルがあるの？と驚くような場所にあります。

ホテル自体は白が基調のモダンな建物です。
私が宿泊したアパートメントタイプの部屋は、キッチン・リビングルーム・ベッドルーム・バスルームととても広く、インテリアも素敵でした。
清掃も行き届いて過ごしやすかったです。
スタッフの方もみんな笑顔で、ホテルを出るとき、外出先から帰った時などは話しかけてくれるなどとても気さくな方々でした。

枕がとっても柔らかく高さもあり、すこし寝づらかったです・・・が、フロントに言うと低めの枕を貸してくれるとのこと。私は利用していませんが、次回行く方はきいてみるといいでしょう。

朝食は、バリスタイル・コンチネンタル・アメリカンスタイルと選ぶことができます。
前日の夜に朝食のメニューを書いた用紙を袋に入れて部屋の前にかけてオーダーです。
ジュースもフレッシュジュースで、種類も豊富！
朝食がとても楽しみでした。

立地もよく、メインストリートまでは徒歩約５分。
近くにバーや食事をするところも多くあるので、遅くまで人通りはあります。
コンビニもあるので便利です。
車は１台通るのがやっとの道沿いなのでタクシーを利用する際は大通りで捕まえる、下してもらうなどするといいと思います。

立地もよく、アットホームでくつろげる居心地の良いホテルです。
次回もぜひ利用したいと思います。
title: アットホームな居心地の良いホテル
